block.text: Tasol dispela bret i lusim heven na i kam daun, em i bilong ol manmeri i ken kaikai na bai ol i no inap i dai.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I am the living bread which came down out of heaven. If anyone eats of this bread, he will live forever. Yes, the bread which I will give for the life of the world is my flesh.”

block.text: Mi dispela bret i gat laip na i lusim heven na i kam daun. Sapos wanpela man i kaikai dispela bret, em bai i gat laip i stap oltaim. Na dispela bret mi bai givim long em, em i bodi bilong mi. Mi givim bai ol manmeri bilong graun ol i ken kisim laip."

ReferenceBlocks.text: The Jews therefore contended with one another, saying,

block.text: Ol Juda i harim dispela tok na ol i pait long toktok namel long ol yet. Ol i tok,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “How can this man give us his flesh to eat?”

block.text: "Olsem wanem na dispela man em inap givim bodi bilong en long yumi na yumi kaikai?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus therefore said to them,

block.text: Orait Jisas i tokim ol olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Most certainly I tell you, unless you eat the flesh of the Son of Man and drink his blood, you don't have life in yourselves.

block.text: "Tru tumas mi tokim yupela, sapos yupela i no kaikai bodi bilong Pikinini Bilong Man, na sapos yupela i no dringim blut bilong em, bai yupela i no gat laip i stap long yupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He who eats my flesh and drinks my blood has eternal life, and I will raise him up at the last day.

block.text: Man i save kaikai bodi bilong mi na dringim blut bilong mi, em i gat laip i stap gut oltaim oltaim, na bai mi kirapim em long las de.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For my flesh is food indeed, and my blood is drink indeed.

block.text: Long wanem, bodi bilong mi em i kaikai tru, na blut bilong mi em i samting tru bilong dring.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He who eats my flesh and drinks my blood lives in me, and I in him.

block.text: Man i kaikai bodi bilong mi na i dringim blut bilong mi, em i stap long mi, na mi stap long em.

ReferenceBlocks.text: As the living Father sent me, and I live because of the Father; so he who feeds on me, he will also live because of me.

block.text: Papa i gat laip em i bin salim mi na mi kam, na mi stap laip long strong bilong Papa. Olsem tasol man i kaikai mi em bai i kisim laip long strong bilong mi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: This is the bread which came down out of heaven--not as our fathers ate the manna, and died. He who eats this bread will live forever.”

block.text: Dispela tasol em bret i lusim heven na i kam daun. Em i no wankain olsem dispela bret bipo ol tumbuna i kaikai, na bihain ol i dai. Nogat. Man i kaikai dispela bret, em bai i stap laip oltaim oltaim."

ReferenceBlocks.text: He said these things in the synagogue, as he taught in Capernaum.

block.text: Jisas i stap insait long haus lotu long taun Kaperneam, na em i laik skulim ol manmeri na em i givim dispela tok long ol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Therefore many of his disciples, when they heard this, said,

block.text: Ol disaipel i harim dispela tok bilong Jisas, na planti bilong ol i tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “This is a hard saying! Who can listen to it?”

block.text: "Dispela tok em i hevi tumas. Husat inap long harim?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: But Jesus knowing in himself that his disciples murmured at this, said to them,

block.text: Tasol long bel bilong en Jisas i save olsem, ol disaipel bilong en i toktok planti long dispela tok em i bin mekim. Olsem na em i askim ol,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Does this cause you to stumble?

block.text: "Dispela tok em i bagarapim bilip bilong yupela, a?

ReferenceBlocks.text: Then what if you would see the Son of Man ascending to where he was before?

block.text: Na sapos yupela i lukim Pikinini Bilong Man i go antap long dispela ples bipo em i stap long en, orait olsem wanem?

ReferenceBlocks.text: It is the spirit who gives life. The flesh profits nothing. The words that I speak to you are spirit, and are life.

block.text: Holi Spirit yet i save givim laip long ol manmeri. Bodi em i no inap helpim yumi liklik. Dispela tok mi givim long yupela, em i spirit, na em i gat laip.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But there are some of you who don't believe.”

block.text: Tasol sampela man namel long yupela ol i no bilip."

ReferenceBlocks.text: For Jesus knew from the beginning who they were who didn't believe, and who it was who would betray him.
He said,

block.text: Bipo yet Jisas i save pinis long ol man i no bilip. Na em i save long dispela man bai i givim em long han bilong ol birua.
Olsem na em i tok,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “For this cause have I said to you that no one can come to me, unless it is given to him by my Father.”

block.text: "Ol i no bilip, na long dispela as tasol mi bin tokim yupela, 'Sapos Papa i no givim strong long wanpela man, orait dispela man bai I no inap i kam long mi.' "

ReferenceBlocks.text: At this, many of his disciples went back, and walked no more with him.

block.text: Jisas i autim dispela tok pinis, na planti disaipel bilong en i lusim em, na ol i go bek, na ol i no wokabaut moa wantaim em.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus said therefore to the twelve,

block.text: Olsem na Jisas i askim 12 -pela disaipel olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “You don't also want to go away, do you?”

block.text: "Ating yupela tu i laik lusim mi na i go?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: Simon Peter answered him,

block.text: Saimon Pita I bekim tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Lord, to whom would we go? You have the words of eternal life.

block.text: "Bikpela, bai mipela i go long husat? Tok bilong yu tasol i save givim laip i stap gut oltaim oltaim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: We have come to believe and know that you are the Christ, the Son of the living God.”

block.text: Na mipela I bilip, na i save gut olsem, yu dispela gutpela stretpela man God i bin makim bilong em yet."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus answered them,

block.text: Jisas i bekim tok long ol olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Didn't I choose you, the twelve, and yet one of you is a devil?”

block.text: "Olsem wanem? Mi yet mi bin makim yupela ol 12 -pela disaipel. Tasol wanpela namel long yupela em i olsem wanpela spirit nogut."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now he spoke of Judas, the son of Simon Iscariot, for it was he who would betray him, being one of the twelve.

block.text: Em i tok long Judas, pikinini bilong Saimon Iskariot. Em i wanpela bilong ol 12 -pela disaipel, tasol bihain em i givim Jisas long han bilong ol man i laik kilim em i dai.

ReferenceBlocks.text: JOHN CHP 7
After these things, Jesus was walking in Galilee, for he wouldn't walk in Judea, because the Jews sought to kill him.

block.text: Long sampela taim bihain, Jisas i raun insait long distrik Galili tasol. Em i no laik i go raun moa insait long distrik Judia, long wanem, ol Juda i laik kilim em i dai.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now the feast of the Jews, the Feast of Booths, was at hand.

block.text: Na ol bikpela de bilong lotu bilong ol Juda klostu ol i laik kamap, em Ol Bikpela De Bilong I Stap Long Haus Win.

ReferenceBlocks.text: His brothers therefore said to him,

block.text: Olsem na ol brata bilong en i tokim em olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Depart from here, and go into Judea, that your disciples also may see your works which you do.

block.text: "Yu mas lusim dispela ples na yu go long Judia, bai ol disaipel bilong yu i ken lukim ol dispela narakain wok yu save mekim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For no one does anything in secret, and himself seeks to be known openly. If you do these things, reveal yourself to the world.”

block.text: Sapos wanpela man i laik bai ol man i save long em, em i no save mekim wok long ples hait. Sapos yu laik mekim ol dispela kain samting, orait yu mas sanap ples klia long ai bilong olgeta manmeri."

ReferenceBlocks.text: For even his brothers didn't believe in him.
Jesus therefore said to them,

block.text: Ol brata bilong en tu ol i no bilip long em, na ol i mekim dispela tok.
Orait na Jisas i bekim tok bilong ol olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “My time has not yet come, but your time is always ready.

block.text: "Taim bilong mi em i no kamap yet. Tasol olgeta taim em i taim bilong yupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The world can't hate you, but it hates me, because I testify about it, that its works are evil.

block.text: Ol manmeri bilong graun ol i no inap birua long yupela. Tasol ol i birua long mi, long wanem, mi save autim tok long ol pasin nogut ol i save mekim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: You go up to the feast. I am not yet going up to this feast, because my time is not yet fulfilled.”

block.text: Yupela go long ol dispela bikpela de bilong lotu long Jerusalem. Mi, bai mi no inap i go, long wanem, taim bilong mi em i no kamap yet."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Having said these things to them, he stayed in Galilee.

block.text: Em i tok olsem long ol, na em i wet i stap long Galili.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But when his brothers had gone up to the feast, then he also went up, not publicly, but as it were in secret.

block.text: Tasol taim ol brata bilong en i go pinis, orait bihain Jisas tu i go. Tasol em i hait tasol na i go, bai ol man i no ken luksave long em.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The Jews therefore sought him at the feast, and said,

block.text: Long taim bilong ol bikpela de bilong lotu, ol bikman bilong ol Juda i wok long painim em, na ol i tok,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Where is he?”

block.text: "Dispela man i stap we?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: There was much murmuring among the multitudes concerning him. Some said,

block.text: Na ol manmeri i toktok planti long em namel long ol yet. Sampela i tok,

block.characterId: crowd at Festival of Tabernacles in Jerusalem, some

ReferenceBlocks.characterId: crowd at Festival of Tabernacles in Jerusalem, some
ReferenceBlocks.text: “He is a good man.”

block.text: "Em i gutpela man."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Others said,

block.text: Tasol sampela i tok,

block.characterId: crowd at Festival of Tabernacles in Jerusalem, others

ReferenceBlocks.characterId: crowd at Festival of Tabernacles in Jerusalem, others
ReferenceBlocks.text: “Not so. He leads people astray.”

block.text: "Nogat. Em i save giamanim ol manmeri."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Yet no one spoke openly of him for fear of the Jews.

block.text: Tasol ol i pret long ol bikman bilong ol Juda, olsem na i no gat wanpela man i mekim toktok long pasin bilong en long ples klia.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But when it was now the midst of the feast, Jesus went up into the temple and taught.

block.text: Orait namel tru long ol dispela bikpela de, Jisas i go insait long banis bilong tempel na i skulim ol manmeri.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The Jews therefore marveled, saying,

block.text: Ol Juda i harim dispela tok bilong en, na ol i tingting planti na ol i tok,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “How does this man know letters, having never been educated?”

block.text: "Olsem wanem na dispela man i gat ol dispela save? Em i no bin i go long skul."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus therefore answered them,

block.text: Orait Jisas i bekim tok bilong ol olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “My teaching is not mine, but his who sent me.

block.text: "Dispela tok mi givim yupela, em i no bilong mi yet. Nogat. Em i bilong God, em i bin salim mi na mi kam.

ReferenceBlocks.text: If anyone desires to do his will, he will know about the teaching, whether it is from God, or if I am speaking from myself.

block.text: Sapos wanpela man i gat laik tru bilong bihainim tok bilong God, orait em bai i save tru long as bilong dispela tok mi autim. Em bai i save, dispela tok i kam long God, o em i kamap long tingting bilong mi yet.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He who speaks from himself seeks his own glory, but he who seeks the glory of him who sent him is true, and no unrighteousness is in him.

block.text: Man i mekim toktok long tingting bilong em yet, em i laik litimapim nem bilong em yet. Tasol man i laik litimapim nem bilong man i bin salim em i kam, dispela man em i stretpela man. Em i no man bilong giaman.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Didn't Moses give you the law, and yet none of you keeps the law? Why do you seek to kill me?”

block.text: "Bipo Moses i bin givim lo long yupela. Tasol i no gat wanpela man namel long yupela i save bihainim dispela lo. Watpo yupela i laik kilim mi i dai?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: The multitude answered,

block.text: Ol manmeri i bekim tok bilong em olsem,

block.characterId: crowd at Festival of Tabernacles in Jerusalem, the

ReferenceBlocks.characterId: crowd at Festival of Tabernacles in Jerusalem, the
ReferenceBlocks.text: “You have a demon! Who seeks to kill you?”

block.text: "Ating wanpela spirit nogut I stap long yu. Husat i laik kilim yu i dai?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus answered them,

block.text: Jisas i bekim tok bilong ol olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “I did one work, and you all marvel because of it.

block.text: "Mi bin mekim wanpela wok, na yupela olgeta i tingting planti.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Moses has given you circumcision (not that it is of Moses, but of the fathers), and on the Sabbath you circumcise a boy.

block.text: Tasol tingim. Moses i bin givim yupela pasin bilong katim skin, na yupela i save katim skin bilong ol pikinini long de Sabat tu. Tru, i no Moses yet i bin kamapim dispela pasin. Em i kamap long ol tumbuna.

ReferenceBlocks.text: If a boy receives circumcision on the Sabbath, that the law of Moses may not be broken, are you angry with me, because I made a man completely healthy on the Sabbath?

block.text: Yupela i laik bihainim gut lo bilong Moses, na yupela i save katim skin bilong pikinini long de Sabat. Orait sapos mi mekim orait tru bodi bilong wanpela man long de Sabat, watpo yupela i belhat long mi?

ReferenceBlocks.text: Don't judge according to appearance, but judge righteous judgment.”

block.text: Yupela i no ken skelim ol samting long ai nating. Yupela i mas skelim olgeta samting long pasin i stret."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Therefore some of them of Jerusalem said,

block.text: Sampela manmeri bilong Jerusalem i lukim ol samting Jisas i mekim na ol i tok,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Isn't this he whom they seek to kill?
Behold, he speaks openly, and they say nothing to him. Can it be that the rulers indeed know that this is truly the Christ?

block.text: "Olsem wanem? Em dispela man tasol ol bikman i laik kilim em I dai.
Na lukim. Em i mekim toktok long ples klia, na ol i no mekim wanpela tok long em. Ating ol i save, em i dispela man God i bin promis long salim i kam bilong kisim bek ol manmeri bilong en?

ReferenceBlocks.text: However we know where this man comes from, but when the Christ comes, no one will know where he comes from.”

block.text: Tasol yumi save long as ples bilong dispela man. Na taim man God i bin promis long salim i kam, em i kamap, bai i no gat wanpela man i save long as ples bilong en."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus therefore cried out in the temple, teaching and saying,

block.text: Jisas i stap long tempel na i autim tok long ol manmeri. Na em i singaut olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Yes you know me and you know where I am from. I have not come of myself, but he who sent me is true, whom you don't know.

block.text: "Yupela i ting yupela i save long mi, na yupela i save long as ples bilong mi, a? Tasol mi no kam long laik bilong mi yet. Papa i salim mi na mi kam. Pasin bilong en i tru, tasol yupela i no save long em.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I know him, because I am from him, and he sent me.”

block.text: Mi, mi save long em. Mi bin i stap wantaim em, na em i salim mi na mi kam."

ReferenceBlocks.text: They sought therefore to take him; but no one laid a hand on him, because his hour had not yet come.

block.text: Ol i harim dispela tok na ol i laik kalabusim em. Tasol taim bilong en i no yet, olsem na i no gat wanpela man i putim han long em. Nogat.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But of the multitude, many believed in him. They said,

block.text: Planti manmeri ol i bilip long em, na ol i tok,

block.characterId: crowd at Festival of Tabernacles in Jerusalem, many in the

ReferenceBlocks.characterId: crowd at Festival of Tabernacles in Jerusalem, many in the
ReferenceBlocks.text: “When the Christ comes, he won't do more signs than those which this man has done, will he?”

block.text: "Taim dispela man God i bin promis long salim i kam, em i kamap, ating em bai i wokim planti mirakel i winim ol mirakel dispela man hia i wokim?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: The Pharisees heard the multitude murmuring these things concerning him, and the chief priests and the Pharisees sent officers to arrest him.
Then Jesus said,

block.text: Ol Farisi I harim ol man i mekim ol kain kain toktok long ol samting Jisas i mekim. Olsem na ol bikpris na ol Farisi i salim ol plisman i kam bilong holimpasim em.
Na Jisas i tok,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “I will be with you a little while longer, then I go to him who sent me.

block.text: "Liklik taim tasol bai mi stap wantaim yupela, na bai mi go bek long Papa, em i bin salim mi na mi kam.

ReferenceBlocks.text: You will seek me, and won't find me; and where I am, you can't come.”

block.text: Na bai yupela i wok long painim mi, tasol bai yupela i no lukim mi. Na yupela i no inap i go long ples mi stap long en."

ReferenceBlocks.text: The Jews therefore said among themselves,

block.text: Orait na ol Juda i toktok namel long ol yet olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Where will this man go that we won't find him?

block.text: "Bai em i go we na yumi no inap lukim em?

ReferenceBlocks.text: Will he go to the Dispersion among the Greeks, and teach the Greeks?

block.text: Ating em bai i go long ol wanlain bilong yumi i stap long kantri bilong ol Grik, na em bai i wok long skulim ol Grik, a?

ReferenceBlocks.text: What is this word that he said, ‘You will seek me, and won't find me; and where I am, you can't come’?”

block.text: Em i tok, 'Bai yupela i wok long painim mi, tasol bai yupela i no lukim mi.' Na em i tok, 'Yupela i no inap i go long ples mi stap long en.' Wanem as bilong dispela tok?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now on the last and greatest day of the feast, Jesus stood and cried out,

block.text: Las de bilong ol dispela bikpela de bilong lotu, em i olsem bikpela de tru. Na long dispela de Jisas i sanap na i singaut olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “If anyone is thirsty, let him come to me and drink!
He who believes in me, as the Scripture has said, from within him will flow rivers of living water.”

block.text: "Sapos wanpela man i dai long wara, orait em i ken i kam long mi na dring.
Em i olsem tok i stap long buk bilong God, sapos man I bilip long mi, orait planti wara i gat laip bai i kamap long bel bilong en na i ran i go."

ReferenceBlocks.text: But he said this about the Spirit, which those believing in him were to receive. For the Holy Spirit was not yet given, because Jesus wasn't yet glorified.

block.text: Jisas i tok long Holi Spirit ol man i bilip long em ol bai i kisim. Long dispela taim Jisas i no kisim biknem yet, olsem na Holi Spirit i no kam yet.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Many of the multitude therefore, when they heard these words, said,

block.text: Sampela manmeri i harim ol tok Jisas i mekim na ol i tok,

block.characterId: crowd at Festival of Tabernacles in Jerusalem, some

ReferenceBlocks.characterId: crowd at Festival of Tabernacles in Jerusalem, some
ReferenceBlocks.text: “This is truly the prophet.”

block.text: "Tru tumas, dispela man em i dispela profet God i bin tok long salim i kam long graun."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Others said,

block.text: Na ol arapela i tok,

block.characterId: crowd at Festival of Tabernacles in Jerusalem, others

ReferenceBlocks.characterId: crowd at Festival of Tabernacles in Jerusalem, others
ReferenceBlocks.text: “This is the Christ.”

block.text: "Em i man God i makim bilong kisim bek ol manmeri bilong en."

ReferenceBlocks.text: But some said,

block.text: Tasol sampela i tok,

block.characterId: crowd at Festival of Tabernacles in Jerusalem, still others

ReferenceBlocks.characterId: crowd at Festival of Tabernacles in Jerusalem, still others
ReferenceBlocks.text: “What, does the Christ come out of Galilee?

block.text: "Nogat. Dispela man God i makim, em bai i no inap kamap long Galili. Nogat.

block.characterId: crowd at Festival of Tabernacles in Jerusalem, still others

ReferenceBlocks.characterId: crowd at Festival of Tabernacles in Jerusalem, still others
ReferenceBlocks.text: Hasn't the Scripture said that the Christ comes of the seed of David, and from Bethlehem, the village where David was?”

block.text: Buk bilong God i tok olsem dispela man i mas kamap long lain bilong King Devit, na em bai i kamap long Betlehem, dispela taun bipo Devit i stap long en."

ReferenceBlocks.text: So there arose a division in the multitude because of him.

block.text: Olsem na ol manmeri i gat narapela narapela tingting long Jisas na ol i bruk tupela lain.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Some of them would have arrested him, but no one laid hands on him.

block.text: Sampela i laik kalabusim em, tasol i no gat wanpela man i putim han long em.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The officers therefore came to the chief priests and Pharisees. The Pharisees said to them,

block.text: Orait ol plisman i go bek gen long ol bikpris na ol Farisi. Na ol i askim ol plisman olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Why didn't you bring him?”

block.text: "Bilong wanem yupela i no bringim em i kam?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: The officers answered,

block.text: Na ol plisman i bekim tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “No man ever spoke like this man!”

block.text: "Bipo i no gat wanpela man i mekim toktok olsem dispela man i mekim."

ReferenceBlocks.text: The Pharisees therefore answered them,

block.text: Na ol Farisi i bekim tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “You aren't also led astray, are you?
Have any of the rulers believed in him, or of the Pharisees?

block.text: "Em i trikim yupela tu, a?
Ating long lain bilong mipela ol hetman na ol Farisi, yupela i lukim wanpela man i bilip long em? Nogat tru.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But this multitude that doesn't know the law is accursed.”

block.text: Ol lain i bilip long em, em ol dispela lain manmeri ol i no save long lo. God i tok pinis long ol bai i bagarap."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Nicodemus (he who came to him by night, being one of them) said to them,

block.text: Nikodemus, em dispela man bipo i bin i go long Jisas, em i bilong lain bilong ol. Orait em i tokim ol olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Does our law judge a man, unless it first hears from him personally and knows what he does?”

block.text: "Ating lo bilong yumi em i tok long yumi ken kotim nating wanpela man? Nogat. Yumi mas harim tok bilong en pastaim, na bai yumi ken save gut long samting em i bin mekim."

ReferenceBlocks.text: They answered him,

block.text: Tasol ol i bekim tok bilong en olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Are you also from Galilee? Search, and see that no prophet has arisen out of Galilee.”

block.text: "Ating yu tu yu man bilong Galili, a? Ritim gut ol tok i stap long buk bilong God, na bai yu tu yu ken save olsem, i no gat wanpela profet bai i kamap long Galili."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Everyone went to his own house.

block.text: Olgeta man i go nabaut long haus bilong ol,

ReferenceBlocks.text: JOHN CHP 8
but Jesus went to the Mount of Olives.

block.text: tasol Jisas i go long maunten Oliv.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now very early in the morning, he came again into the temple, and all the people came to him. He sat down, and taught them.

block.text: Long moningtaim tru em i go gen insait long banis bilong tempel. Na olgeta manmeri i kam long em. Na em i sindaun na i wok long skulim ol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The scribes and the Pharisees brought a woman taken in adultery. Having set her in the midst,
they told him,

block.text: Orait ol saveman bilong lo na ol Farisi i kisim wanpela maritmeri ol i bin lukim em i mekim pasin pamuk, na ol i bringim em i kam na mekim em i sanap long ai bilong ol manmeri.
Na ol i tokim Jisas olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Teacher, we found this woman in adultery, in the very act.

block.text: "Tisa, dispela maritmeri i bin mekim pasin pamuk na ol i lukim em.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now in our law, Moses commanded us to stone such. What then do you say about her?”

block.text: Long lo, Moses i bin tok olsem yumi mas tromoi ston long kain meri olsem na kilim em i dai. Na yu tok wanem?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: They said this testing him, that they might have something to accuse him of. But Jesus stooped down, and wrote on the ground with his finger.

block.text: Ol i mekim dispela tok bilong traim em, long wanem, ol i laik bai em i mekim wanpela tok ol i ken kotim em long en. Tasol Jisas i lindaun na i rait long graun long pinga bilong en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But when they continued asking him, he looked up and said to them,

block.text: Ol i askim askim moa yet, olsem na Jisas i sanap na i tokim ol olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “He who is without sin among you, let him throw the first stone at her.”

block.text: "Wanem man namel long yupela i no bin mekim sin, em I ken tromoi namba wan ston long dispela meri."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Again he stooped down, and with his finger wrote on the ground.

block.text: Na em i lindaun gen na i rait long graun.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They, when they heard it, being convicted by their conscience, went out one by one, beginning from the oldest, even to the last. Jesus was left alone with the woman where she was, in the middle.

block.text: Ol i harim dispela tok, na olgeta wan wan ol i lusim dispela ples na i go. Ol man i gat planti krismas ol i go pas, na ol arapela man i go bihain. Na Jisas wanpela tasol i lindaun yet i stap, na meri i sanap i stap long pes bilong em.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus, standing up, saw her and said,

block.text: Orait Jisas i sanap na i tokim meri olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Woman, where are your accusers? Did no one condemn you?”

block.text: "Meri, ol dispela man i go we? Ating i no gat wanpela man i stap bilong kotim yu?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: She said,

block.text: Na meri I tok,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “No one, Lord.”

block.text: "Bikman, i no gat wanpela."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus said,

block.text: Na Jisas i tok,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Neither do I condemn you. Go your way. From now on, sin no more.”

block.text: "Mi tu, mi no kotim yu. Yu go, na bihain yu no ken mekim sin gen."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Again, therefore, Jesus spoke to them, saying,

block.text: Jisas i tokim ol manmeri gen olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “I am the light of the world. He who follows me will not walk in the darkness, but will have the light of life.”

block.text: "Mi yet mi lait bilong graun. Man i bihainim mi, em bai i no inap wokabaut long tudak. Nogat. Em bai i gat lait bilong laip."

ReferenceBlocks.text: The Pharisees therefore said to him,

block.text: Ol Farisi i harim dispela tok na ol i tokim Jisas olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “You testify about yourself. Your testimony is not valid.”

block.text: "Yu save tokaut long ol wok na pasin bilong yu yet. Olsem na ol man i no mas bilipim dispela tok yu autim."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus answered them,

block.text: Na Jisas i bekim tok bilong ol olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Even if I do testify about myself, my testimony is true because I know where I came from, and where I am going; but you don't know where I came from or where I am going.

block.text: "I tru, mi autim tok long pasin bilong mi yet. Tasol ol man i ken bilipim tok bilong mi, long wanem, mi save long ples mi kirap long en na mi kam, na mi save long ples mi bai i go long en. Tasol yupela i no save long as ples bilong mi. Na mi go we, em tu yupela i no save.

ReferenceBlocks.text: You judge according to the flesh. I judge no one.

block.text: Yupela i save skelim ol man long pasin bilong graun. Mi no save skelim pasin bilong wanpela man.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Yet even if I do judge, my judgment is true for I am not alone, but I am with the Father who sent me.

block.text: Tasol sapos mi skelim pasin bilong wanpela man, orait ol man i ken bilipim tok mi autim, long wanem, i no mi wanpela tasol i skelim em. Nogat. Papa i bin salim mi na mi kam, em i wok wantaim mi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: It's also written in your law that the testimony of two people is valid.

block.text: Long lo bilong yupela, tok i stap olsem. Sapos tupela man i autim wankain tok, orait tok bilong tupela em i tru.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I am one who testifies about myself, and the Father who sent me also testifies about me.”

block.text: Mi yet mi save autim tok long ol wok na pasin bilong mi yet, na Papa i salim mi na mi kam, em tu i autim tok long wok na pasin bilong mi."

ReferenceBlocks.text: They said therefore to him,

block.text: Orait ol Farisi I askim em olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Where is your Father?”

block.text: "Dispela Papa yu tok long en, em i stap we?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus answered,

block.text: Na Jisas i bekim tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “You know neither me, nor my Father. If you knew me, you would know my Father also.”

block.text: "Yupela i no save long mi, na yupela i no save long Papa bilong mi. Sapos yupela i save long mi, orait yupela bai i save long Papa bilong mi tu."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus spoke these words in the treasury, as he taught in the temple. Yet no one arrested him, because his hour had not yet come.

block.text: Jisas i skulim ol manmeri i stap klostu long rum mani bilong tempel, na em i mekim ol dispela tok. Na i no gat wanpela man i holimpasim em, long wanem, taim bilong en i no yet.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus said therefore again to them,

block.text: Jisas i tokim ol manmeri moa olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “I am going away, and you will seek me, and you will die in your sins. Where I go, you can't come.”

block.text: "Mi go nau, na bai yupela i no inap lukim mi. Na sin bilong yupela bai i stap yet, na yupela bai i dai. Yupela i no inap i go long ples mi go long en."

ReferenceBlocks.text: The Jews therefore said,

block.text: Ol Juda i harim dispela tok na ol i tokim ol yet olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Will he kill himself, that he says, ‘Where I am going, you can't come?’”

block.text: "Olsem wanem na em i tok, Yupela i no inap i go long ples mi go long en'? Ating em bai i kilim I dai em yet?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: He said to them,

block.text: Na Jisas i tokim ol olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “You are from beneath. I am from above. You are of this world. I am not of this world.

block.text: "Yupela ol lain bilong daunbilo. Tasol mi, mi bilong antap. Yupela i bilong dispela graun. Tasol mi no bilong dispela graun.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I said therefore to you that you will die in your sins; for unless you believe that I am he, you will die in your sins.”

block.text: Olsem na mi tokim yupela pinis, ol sin bilong yupela bai i stap yet, na yupela bai i dai. Sapos yupela i no bilip olsem Mi Yet Mi Stap Olsem, orait ol sin bilong yupela bai i stap yet, na yupela bai i dai."

ReferenceBlocks.text: They said therefore to him,

block.text: Ol i askim em,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Who are you?”

block.text: "Yu husat?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus said to them,

block.text: Na Jisas i tokim ol,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Just what I have been saying to you from the beginning.

block.text: "Mi husat, em mi tokim yupela pinis.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I have many things to speak and to judge concerning you. However he who sent me is true; and the things which I heard from him, these I say to the world.”

block.text: Mi gat planti tok mi mas mekim long ol pasin bilong yupela. Na bai mi skelim ol pasin bilong yupela olsem jas. Tasol Man i bin salim mi na mi kam, pasin bilong en i tru olgeta. Na olgeta tok mi harim long em, em mi save autim long ol manmeri bilong graun."

ReferenceBlocks.text: They didn't understand that he spoke to them about the Father.
Jesus therefore said to them,

block.text: Ol i no save olsem Jisas i tokim ol long Papa,
olsem na em i tokim ol olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “When you have lifted up the Son of Man, then you will know that I am he, and I do nothing of myself, but as my Father taught me, I say these things.

block.text: "Taim yupela i litimapim Pikinini Bilong Man, orait yupela bai i save olsem, Mi Yet Mi Stap Olsem. Na bai yupela i save, mi no mekim wanpela samting long tingting bilong mi yet. Nogat. Mi save autim olgeta tok olsem Papa i bin soim mi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He who sent me is with me. The Father hasn't left me alone, for I always do the things that are pleasing to him.”

block.text: Papa i bin salim mi na mi kam, em i stap wantaim mi. Em i no lusim mi, na larim mi i stap wanpis. Nogat. Em i no lusim mi, long wanem, oltaim mi save mekim ol samting em i laikim."

ReferenceBlocks.text: As he spoke these things, many believed in him.

block.text: Ol manmeri i harim Jisas i mekim dispela tok, na planti bilong ol i bilip long em.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus therefore said to those Jews who had believed him,

block.text: Orait Jisas i tokim ol Juda i bilip pinis long em olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “If you remain in my word, then you are truly my disciples.

block.text: "Sapos yupela i holim strong tok bilong mi, orait yupela bai i stap ol disaipel tru bilong mi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: You will know the truth, and the truth will make you free.”

block.text: Na yupela bai i save long tok tru, na tok tru bai i mekim yupela i kamap fri."

ReferenceBlocks.text: They answered him,

block.text: Na ol i bekim tok bilong en olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “We are Abraham's seed, and have never been in bondage to anyone. How do you say, ‘You will be made free?’”

block.text: "Mipela i lain bilong Abraham. I no gat wanpela taim mipela i bin i stap wokboi nating bilong wanpela man. Olsem na bilong wanem yu tok, 'Yupela bai i kamap fri'?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus answered them,

block.text: Jisas i bekim tok bilong ol olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Most certainly I tell you, everyone who commits sin is the bondservant of sin.

block.text: "Tru tumas mi tokim yupela, olgeta man i save mekim sin, ol i stap wokboi nating bilong sin.

ReferenceBlocks.text: A bondservant doesn't live in the house forever. A son remains forever.

block.text: Ol wokboi nating ol i no save stap long haus oltaim. Nogat. Pikinini tasol i save stap oltaim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: If therefore the Son makes you free, you will be free indeed.

block.text: Olsem na sapos Pikinini i mekim yupela i kamap fri, orait yupela i stap fri tru.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I know that you are Abraham's seed, yet you seek to kill me, because my word finds no place in you.

block.text: "Mi save, yupela i lain bilong Abraham. Tasol tok bilong mi em i no i stap insait long yupela. Olsem na yupela i laik kilim mi i dai.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I say the things which I have seen with my Father; and you also do the things which you have seen with your father.”

block.text: Mi save autim tok long ol samting Papa bilong mi i soim mi pinis. Na yupela i save mekim ol pasin yupela i kisim long papa bilong yupela."

ReferenceBlocks.text: They answered him,

block.text: Ol Juda i harim tok bilong Jisas, orait ol i bekim tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Our father is Abraham.”

block.text: "Tumbuna papa bilong mipela em Abraham."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus said to them,

block.text: Na Jisas i tokim ol,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “If you were Abraham's children, you would do the works of Abraham.

block.text: "Sapos i tru yupela ol tumbuna pikinini bilong Abraham, orait yupela bai i mekim wankain pasin olsem Abraham i bin mekim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But now you seek to kill me, a man who has told you the truth, which I heard from God. Abraham didn't do this.

block.text: Mi bin autim long yupela olgeta tok tru mi bin harim long God. Na nau yupela i laik kilim mi i dai. Dispela kain pasin em i no pasin bilong Abraham.

ReferenceBlocks.text: You do the works of your father.”

block.text: Yupela i mekim pasin bilong papa bilong yupela tasol."

ReferenceBlocks.text: They said to him,

block.text: Na ol I tokim em,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “We were not born of sexual immorality. We have one Father, God.”

block.text: "Ol mama bilong mipela ol i no bin pamuk nabaut na karim mipela. Nogat. Mipela i gat wanpela Papa tasol, em God."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Therefore Jesus said to them,

block.text: Na Jisas i tokim ol olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “If God were your father, you would love me, for I came out and have come from God. For I haven't come of myself, but he sent me.

block.text: "Sapos i tru God em i Papa bilong yupela, orait yupela bai i laikim mi, long wanem, mi stap wantaim God na mi kam. Mi no kam long tingting bilong mi yet. Nogat. God i salim mi na mi kam.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Why don't you understand my speech? Because you can't hear my word.

block.text: "Tasol bilong wanem yupela i no klia gut long tok bilong mi? As bilong dispela em i olsem. Yupela i no inap long harim tok bilong mi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: You are of your father, the devil, and you want to do the desires of your father. He was a murderer from the beginning, and doesn't stand in the truth, because there is no truth in him. When he speaks a lie, he speaks on his own; for he is a liar, and the father of lies.

block.text: Yupela i pikinini bilong papa bilong yupela, em Satan. Na yupela i strong long bihainim ol laik bilong papa bilong yupela. Bipo yet em i stap man bilong kilim ol man i dai. Na em i no bihainim pasin i tru, long wanem, pasin i tru em i no i stap long em. Tok giaman em i save mekim, dispela em i tok bilong em stret. Em i man bilong tok giaman, na em i papa tru bilong pasin bilong tok giaman.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But because I tell the truth, you don't believe me.

block.text: Tasol mi save autim tok tru, na yupela i no bilipim tok bilong mi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Which of you convicts me of sin? If I tell the truth, why do you not believe me?

block.text: Yupela i ting mi bin mekim sin, a? Sapos yupela i ting olsem, orait yupela i mas kamapim rong bilong mi. Tasol sapos mi autim tok tru, orait watpo yupela i no bilipim tok bilong mi?

ReferenceBlocks.text: He who is of God hears the words of God. For this cause you don't hear, because you are not of God.”

block.text: Ol pikinini bilong God i save harim olgeta tok bilong God. Yupela i no pikinini bilong God, olsem na yupela i no save harim tok bilong em."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Then the Jews answered him,

block.text: Ol Juda i bekim tok bilong Jisas olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Aren't we right when we say that you are a Samaritan, and have a demon?”

block.text: "Mipela i tok yu man bilong Samaria na wanpela spirit nogut i stap long yu, em i tru, a?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus answered,

block.text: Na Jisas i bekim tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “I don't have a demon, but I honor my Father, and you dishonor me.

block.text: "Mi no gat spirit nogut i stap long mi. Nogat. Mi litimapim nem bilong Papa bilong mi tasol, na yupela i daunim nem bilong mi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But I don't seek my own glory. There is one who seeks and judges.

block.text: Mi no wok long litimapim nem bilong mi yet. I gat wanpela Man i laik litimapim nem bilong mi, na em i jas.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Most certainly, I tell you, if a person keeps my word, he will never see death.”

block.text: Tru tumas mi tokim yupela, sapos wanpela man i bihainim tok bilong mi, em i no inap i dai. Nogat tru."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Then the Jews said to him,

block.text: Orait ol Juda i tokim Jisas olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Now we know that you have a demon. Abraham died, and the prophets; and you say, ‘If a man keeps my word, he will never taste of death.’

block.text: "Nau mipela i save pinis, yu gat spirit nogut i stap long yu. Abraham em i dai pinis, na ol profet tu ol i dai pinis. Na yu tok, 'Sapos wanpela man i bihainim gut tok bilong mi, em i no inap i dai.'

ReferenceBlocks.text: Are you greater than our father, Abraham, who died? The prophets died. Who do you make yourself out to be?”

block.text: Olsem wanem? Ating yu winim tumbuna bilong yumi, Abraham? Em i dai pinis. Na ol profet tu ol i dai pinis. Yu ting yu husat tru?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus answered,

block.text: Jisas i bekim tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “If I glorify myself, my glory is nothing. It is my Father who glorifies me, of whom you say that he is our God.

block.text: "Sapos mi litimapim nem bilong mi yet, orait nem bilong mi em i samting nating. Tasol Papa bilong mi, em i litimapim nem bilong mi. Na yupela i save tok, em i God bilong yupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: You have not known him, but I know him. If I said, ‘I don't know him,’ I would be like you, a liar. But I know him, and keep his word.

block.text: Tasol yupela i no save long em. Mi, mi save long em. Sapos mi tok, 'Mi no save long em,' orait mi bai kamap man bilong giaman olsem yupela. Tasol mi save pinis long em, na mi bihainim gut tok bilong em.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Your father Abraham rejoiced to see my day. He saw it, and was glad.”

block.text: "Taim tumbuna bilong yupela Abraham em i tingting long lukim taim bilong mi, em i bin amamas. Na taim em i lukim pinis, orait bel bilong en i gutpela tru."

ReferenceBlocks.text: The Jews therefore said to him,

block.text: Ol Juda i harim dispela tok na ol I tokim Jisas olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “You are not yet fifty years old, and have you seen Abraham?”

block.text: "Yu no gat 50 krismas yet, na yu bin lukim Abraham, a?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus said to them,

block.text: Na Jisas i tokim ol,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Most certainly, I tell you, before Abraham came into existence, I AM.”

block.text: "Tru tumas mi tokim yupela, taim Abraham i no kamap yet, Mi Yet Mi Stap Olsem."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Therefore they took up stones to throw at him, but Jesus was hidden, and went out of the temple, having gone through their midst, and so passed by.

block.text: Orait ol i kisim ol ston bilong tromoi long em. Tasol Jisas i hait na i lusim banis bilong tempel na i go ausait.

ReferenceBlocks.text: JOHN CHP 9
As he passed by, he saw a man blind from birth.
His disciples asked him,

block.text: Jisas i wokabaut i go, na em i lukim wanpela man aipas. Taim mama i karim em, em i aipas pinis.
Na ol disaipel bilong Jisas I askim em,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Rabbi, who sinned, this man or his parents, that he was born blind?”

block.text: "Tisa, husat i mekim sin na taim mama i karim dispela man em i kamap aipas? Dispela man yet i mekim sin, o papamama bilong en I mekim sin?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus answered,

block.text: Na Jisas i bekim tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Neither did this man sin, nor his parents; but, that the works of God might be revealed in him.

block.text: "Dispela man i no mekim sin, na papamama bilong en tu i no mekim sin. Nogat. Dispela samting i bin kamap bai ol manmeri i ken lukim samting i kamap long dispela man, na wok bilong God i ken kamap ples klia long ol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I must work the works of him who sent me, while it is day. The night is coming, when no one can work.

block.text: Nau em i tulait yet, na yumi mas mekim wok bilong God, em i bin salim mi na mi kam. Tudak bai i kamap, na ol man bai i no inap mekim wanpela wok.

ReferenceBlocks.text: While I am in the world, I am the light of the world.”

block.text: Taim mi stap yet long dispela graun, mi yet mi lait bilong dispela graun."

ReferenceBlocks.text: When he had said this, he spat on the ground, made mud with the saliva, anointed the blind man's eyes with the mud,
and said to him,

block.text: Jisas i tok olsem na em i spet long graun. Na em i tanim spet wantaim graun, na i putim dispela graun long ai bilong dispela aipas.
Na Jisas i tokim em olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Go, wash in the pool of Siloam”

block.text: "Yu go waswas long hul wara Siloam."

ReferenceBlocks.text: (which means “Sent”). So he went away, washed, and came back seeing.

block.text: Dispela nem Siloam em i wankain olsem dispela tok, "Ol i salim em i go." Orait dispela aipas em i go na i waswas. Na taim em i kam bek, em inap lukim gut ol samting.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The neighbors therefore, and those who saw that he was blind before, said,

block.text: Orait na ol wanples bilong en wantaim ol man i bin lukim em bipo, taim em i save askim ol manmeri long givim mani samting long em, ol i tok,

block.characterId: neighbors of man blind from birth

ReferenceBlocks.characterId: neighbors of man blind from birth
ReferenceBlocks.text: “Isn't this he who sat and begged?”

block.text: "Olsem wanem? Ating em dispela man tasol bipo i save sindaun na askim ol man long mani?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: Others were saying,

block.text: Sampela i tok,

block.characterId: neighbors of man blind from birth, others

ReferenceBlocks.characterId: neighbors of man blind from birth, others
ReferenceBlocks.text: “It is he.”

block.text: "Yes, em dispela man."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Still others were saying,

block.text: Na sampela i tok,

block.characterId: neighbors of man blind from birth, some

ReferenceBlocks.characterId: neighbors of man blind from birth, some
ReferenceBlocks.text: “He looks like him.”

block.text: "Nogat. Em i wankain olsem dispela man, tasol em i narapela."

ReferenceBlocks.text: He said,

block.text: Na dispela man yet em i tok,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “I am he.”

block.text: "Em mi tasol."

ReferenceBlocks.text: They therefore were asking him,

block.text: Na ol i askim em,

block.characterId: neighbors of man blind from birth

ReferenceBlocks.characterId: neighbors of man blind from birth
ReferenceBlocks.text: “How were your eyes opened?”

block.text: "Olsem wanem na ai bilong yu i gutpela?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: He answered,

block.text: Na em i bekim tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “A man called Jesus made mud, anointed my eyes, and said to me, ‘Go to the pool of Siloam, and wash.’ So I went away and washed, and I received sight.”

block.text: "Dispela man ol i kolim Jisas, em i tanim graun wantaim wara na i putim long ai bilong mi. Na em i tokim mi, 'Yu go long hul wara Siloam na yu waswas.' Olsem na mi go na mi waswas, na ai bilong mi i gutpela, na mi inap lukim gut ol samting."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Then they asked him,

block.text: Na ol i askim em,

block.characterId: neighbors of man blind from birth

ReferenceBlocks.characterId: neighbors of man blind from birth
ReferenceBlocks.text: “Where is he?”

block.text: "Dispela man i stap we?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: He said,

block.text: Na em i tok,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “I don't know.”

block.text: "Mi no save."

ReferenceBlocks.text: They brought him who had been blind to the Pharisees.

block.text: Orait ol i kisim dispela man bipo em i aipas, na ol i bringim em i go long ol Farisi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: It was a Sabbath when Jesus made the mud and opened his eyes.

block.text: Taim Jisas i wokim dispela graun malumalum na i opim ai bilong dispela man, em de Sabat.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Therefore the Pharisees asked him:

block.text: Orait na ol Farisi i askim em gen,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “How did you receive your sight?”

block.text: "Ai bilong yu em i kamap gutpela olsem wanem?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: He said to them,

block.text: Na em i tokim ol olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “He put mud on my eyes, I washed, and I see.”

block.text: "Em i putim graun malumalum long ai bilong mi, na mi waswas, na mi inap lukim gut ol samting."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Some of the Pharisees said,

block.text: Na sampela Farisi i tok,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “This man is not from God, because he doesn't keep the Sabbath.”

block.text: "Yumi save, God i no salim dispela man i kam, long wanem, em i no save bihainim lo bilong de Sabat."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Others said,

block.text: Tasol sampela I tok,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “How can a man who is a sinner do such signs?”

block.text: "Olsem wanem na man i gat sin em inap wokim olkain mirakel olsem?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: There was division among them.

block.text: Na ol i bruk tupela lain.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Therefore they asked the blind man again,

block.text: Orait na ol i askim gen dispela man bipo em i bin i stap aipas,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “What do you say about him, because he opened your eyes?”

block.text: "Dispela man i mekim orait ai bilong yu, yu ting em i wanem kain man?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: He said,

block.text: Na dispela man i bekim tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “He is a prophet.”

block.text: "Em i wanpela profet."

ReferenceBlocks.text: The Jews therefore did not believe concerning him, that he had been blind, and had received his sight, until they called the parents of him who had received his sight,
and asked them,

block.text: I tru, bipo dispela man i aipas na nau ai bilong en i op. Tasol ol Juda i no laik bilipim dispela. Olsem na ol I singautim papamama bilong dispela man ai bilong en i op.
Tupela i kam na ol i askim tupela olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Is this your son, whom you say was born blind? How then does he now see?”

block.text: "Ating dispela em i pikinini bilong yutupela, a? Na taim mama i karim em, em i stap aipas pinis, yutupela i tok olsem, a? Orait olsem wanem na em i save lukluk nau?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: His parents answered them,

block.text: Na papamama bilong en i bekim tok olsem,

block.characterId: parents of cured man, blind from birth

ReferenceBlocks.characterId: parents of cured man, blind from birth
ReferenceBlocks.text: “We know that this is our son, and that he was born blind;

block.text: "Mitupela i save, dispela em I pikinini bilong mitupela. Na taim mama i karim em, em i stap aipas, em tu mitupela i save.

block.characterId: parents of cured man, blind from birth

ReferenceBlocks.characterId: parents of cured man, blind from birth
ReferenceBlocks.text: but how he now sees, we don't know; or who opened his eyes, we don't know. He is of age. Ask him. He will speak for himself.”

block.text: Tasol nau ai bilong en i op olsem wanem, em mitupela i no save. Na husat i opim ai bilong em, em tu mitupela i no save. Yupela i mas askim em. Em i bikpela pinis. Em i ken autim tok bilong em yet."

ReferenceBlocks.text: His parents said these things because they feared the Jews; for the Jews had already agreed that if any man would confess him as Christ, he would be put out of the synagogue.

block.text: Papamama i pret long ol Juda na tupela i mekim dispela tok. Ol Juda i pasim tok pinis olsem, sapos wanpela man i tokaut olsem Jisas em i dispela man God i makim bilong kisim bek ol manmeri bilong en, orait ol bai i tambuim em long kam lotu wantaim ol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: That is why his parents said, “He is of age. Ask him.”

block.text: Long dispela as tasol papamama bilong dispela man i tok, "Em i bikpela pinis. Yupela i mas askim em."

ReferenceBlocks.text: So they called the man who was blind a second time, and said to him,

block.text: Orait na namba 2 taim ol i singautim dispela man bipo em i aipas. Ol i tokim em,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Give glory to God. We know that this man is a sinner.”

block.text: "Yu mas litimapim nem bilong God, na mekim trongpela promis long mekim tok tru tasol. Mipela i save, dispela man yu bin tok long en, em i man bilong mekim sin."

ReferenceBlocks.text: He therefore answered,

block.text: Na em i bekim tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “I don't know if he is a sinner. One thing I do know: that though I was blind, now I see.”

block.text: "Em i man bilong mekim sin, o nogat, em mi no ken save. Wanpela samting tasol mi save. Bipo mi stap aipas, tasol nau ai bilong mi i op."

ReferenceBlocks.text: They said to him again,

block.text: Na ol i askim em gen olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “What did he do to you? How did he open your eyes?”

block.text: "Em i mekim wanem long yu? Em i opim ai bilong yu olsem wanem?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: He answered them,

block.text: Na em i bekim tok bilong ol olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “I told you already, and you didn't listen. Why do you want to hear it again? You don't also want to become his disciples, do you?”

block.text: "Mi tokim yupela pinis, tasol yupela i no laik harim. Bilong wanem na yupela i laik harim planti taim? Ating yupela tu i laik kamap disaipel bilong en, a?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: They insulted him and said,

block.text: Na ol Farisi I tok bilas long dispela man olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “You are his disciple, but we are disciples of Moses.

block.text: "Yu tasol yu disaipel bilong en. Tasol mipela i disaipel bilong Moses.

ReferenceBlocks.text: We know that God has spoken to Moses. But as for this man, we don't know where he comes from.”

block.text: Mipela i save pinis, God i bin givim tok long Moses. Tasol dispela man i kamap we, em mipela i no save."

ReferenceBlocks.text: The man answered them,

block.text: Orait na dispela man bipo em i aipas, em i bekim tok bilong ol olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “How amazing! You don't know where he comes from, yet he opened my eyes.

block.text: "Yupela i mekim narakain tok tru. Dispela man i mekim ai bilong mi i op, na yupela i tok, yupela i no save, em i kamap we.

ReferenceBlocks.text: We know that God doesn't listen to sinners, but if anyone is a worshipper of God, and does his will, he listens to him.

block.text: Yumi save, God i no save harim tok bilong ol man bilong mekim sin. Tasol sapos wanpela man i save lotu long God na i bihainim laik bilong God, orait God i save harim tok bilong em.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Since the world began it has never been heard of that anyone opened the eyes of someone born blind.

block.text: Long bipo tru na i kam inap nau i no gat stori bilong wanpela man em i stap aipas long taim mama i karim em, na bihain wanpela man i opim ai bilong em.

ReferenceBlocks.text: If this man were not from God, he could do nothing.”

block.text: Sapos God i no bin salim dispela man i kam, orait em i no inap mekim wanpela samting."

ReferenceBlocks.text: They answered him,

block.text: Ol Farisi i harim dispela tok na ol I bekim tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “You were altogether born in sins, and do you teach us?”

block.text: "Olsem wanem? Pasin bilong sin i pas tru long yu, stat long taim mama i karim yu na i kam inap nau. Na yu laik skulim mipela, a?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: They threw him out.

block.text: Na ol i rausim em i go.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus heard that they had thrown him out, and finding him, he said,

block.text: Jisas i harim tok long ol i rausim dispela man, orait em i go painim em. Na taim Jisas i lukim em, Jisas i tokim em olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Do you believe in the Son of God?”

block.text: "Yu bilip long Pikinini Bilong Man, o nogat?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: He answered,

block.text: Na em i bekim tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Who is he, Lord, that I may believe in him?”

block.text: "Bikman, dispela Pikinini Bilong Man em husat? Yu tokim mi na mi ken bilip long em."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus said to him,

block.text: Na Jisas i tokim em,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “You have both seen him, and it is he who speaks with you.”

block.text: "Yu lukim em pinis. Em dispela man nau i toktok wantaim yu."

ReferenceBlocks.text: He said,

block.text: Na dispela man i tok,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Lord, I believe!”

block.text: "Bikpela, mi bilip."

ReferenceBlocks.text: and he worshiped him.
Jesus said,

block.text: Na em i brukim skru na i lotu long Jisas.
Na Jisas i tok,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “I came into this world for judgment, that those who don't see may see; and that those who see may become blind.”

block.text: "Mi kam long dispela graun bilong skelim pasin bilong ol manmeri. Olsem na ol man i stap aipas, ol bai i lukluk. Na ol man i save lukluk, ol bai i kamap aipas."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Those of the Pharisees who were with him heard these things, and said to him,

block.text: Sampela Farisi i stap klostu long Jisas, ol i harim dispela tok. Olsem na ol i askim em,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Are we also blind?”

block.text: "Yu laik tok olsem mipela tu i aipas, a?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus said to them,

block.text: Na Jisas i tokim ol olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “If you were blind, you would have no sin; but now you say, ‘We see.’ Therefore your sin remains.”

block.text: "Sapos ai bilong yupela i pas, orait yupela bai i no gat asua bilong sin. Tasol yupela i save tok, 'Ai bilong mipela i save lukluk.' Olsem na sin bilong yupela i stap yet."

ReferenceBlocks.text: JOHN CHP 10
Jesus said to them:

block.text: Jisas i tok moa olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Most certainly, I tell you, one who doesn't enter by the door into the sheep fold, but climbs up some other way, the same is a thief and a robber.

block.text: "Tru tumas mi tokim yupela, man i no save go insait long dua bilong banis bilong sipsip, tasol em i kalapim banis long narapela hap na i go insait, kain man olsem em i stilman na man bilong pulim ol samting bilong ol arapela man.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But one who enters in by the door is the shepherd of the sheep.

block.text: Tasol man i save go insait long dua, em i wasman bilong sipsip.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The gatekeeper opens the gate for him, and the sheep listen to his voice. He calls his own sheep by name, and leads them out.

block.text: Wasman bilong dua em i save opim dua long dispela man. Na ol sipsip ol i save harim maus bilong em. Em i save kolim nem bilong ol wan wan sipsip bilong em yet, na em i kisim ol i go ausait.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Whenever he brings out his own sheep, he goes before them, and the sheep follow him, for they know his voice.

block.text: Em i bringim olgeta sipsip bilong en i go ausait pinis, orait em i save wokabaut i go pas long ol. Na ol sipsip i save long maus bilong en, olsem na ol i bihainim em i go.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They will by no means follow a stranger, but will flee from him; for they don't know the voice of strangers.”

block.text: Ol i no save bihainim ol arapela man. Nogat. Sapos narapela man i singautim ol, ol sipsip bai i ranawe long em, long wanem, ol i no save long maus bilong ol arapela man."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus spoke this parable to them, but they didn't understand what he was telling them.
Jesus therefore said to them again,

block.text: Jisas i givim dispela tok bokis long ol, tasol ol i no save long as bilong dispela tok em i mekim long ol.
Olsem na Jisas i tokim ol gen olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Most certainly, I tell you, I am the sheep's door.

block.text: "Mi tok tru tumas long yupela, mi yet mi dua bilong sipsip.

ReferenceBlocks.text: All who came before me are thieves and robbers, but the sheep didn't listen to them.

block.text: Olgeta man i bin kam paslain long mi, ol i stilman na man bilong pulim ol samting. Tasol ol sipsip i no bin harim maus bilong ol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I am the door. If anyone enters in by me, he will be saved, and will go in and go out, and will find pasture.

block.text: Mi yet mi dua. Sapos wanpela man i kam long mi na i go insait long banis, orait God bai i kisim bek em. Na em bai i go insait na i go ausait, na i go i kam na kisim kaikai.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The thief only comes to steal, kill, and destroy. I came that they may have life, and may have it abundantly.

block.text: "Stilman i no save kam bilong mekim narapela samting. Nogat. Em i kam bilong stilim ol sipsip na bilong kilim ol i dai na bagarapim ol. Tasol mi, mi kam bilong ol i ken kisim laip, na bilong laip i ken pulap tru long ol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.

block.text: Mi yet mi gutpela wasman bilong ol sipsip. Gutpela wasman bilong sipsip em i save lusim laip bilong em yet bilong helpim ol sipsip.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He who is a hired hand, and not a shepherd, who doesn't own the sheep, sees the wolf coming, leaves the sheep, and flees. The wolf snatches the sheep, and scatters them.

block.text: Sapos man i wok mani tasol, na em i no wasman tru bilong ol sipsip, na em i no papa bilong ol sipsip, orait taim em i lukim weldok i kam, em bai i lusim ol sipsip na ranawe. Na weldok bai i kaikaim ol sipsip na ranim ol i go nabaut.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The hired hand flees because he is a hired hand, and doesn't care for the sheep.

block.text: Dispela man bai i mekim olsem, long wanem, em i wok long kisim pe tasol. Em i no tingting tru long ol sipsip.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I am the good shepherd. I know my own, and I'm known by my own;
even as the Father knows me, and I know the Father. I lay down my life for the sheep.

block.text: "Mi yet mi gutpela wasman bilong ol sipsip. Mi save long ol sipsip bilong mi, na ol sipsip bilong mi ol i save long mi,
olsem Papa i save long mi, na mi save long Papa. Na bai mi lusim laip bilong mi bilong helpim ol sipsip.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I have other sheep, which are not of this fold. I must bring them also, and they will hear my voice. They will become one flock with one shepherd.

block.text: Mi gat ol arapela sipsip tu, na ol i no bilong dispela banis. Mi mas bringim ol dispela sipsip tu i kam. Na bai ol i harim maus bilong mi. Na bai i gat wanpela lain sipsip tasol na wanpela wasman tasol bilong ol sipsip.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Therefore the Father loves me, because I lay down my life, that I may take it again.

block.text: Papa i laikim mi tru, long wanem, mi bai lusim laip bilong mi na bai mi kisim bek gen.

ReferenceBlocks.text: No one takes it away from me, but I lay it down by myself. I have power to lay it down, and I have power to take it again. I received this commandment from my Father.”

block.text: I no gat wanpela man inap pinisim laip bilong mi. Nogat. Long laik bilong mi yet mi bai lusim laip bilong mi. Mi gat strong inap long lusim laip bilong mi, na mi gat strong inap long kisim bek gen. Papa bilong mi i bin tok long mi mas mekim olsem."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Therefore a division arose again among the Jews because of these words.
Many of them said,

block.text: Ol Juda i harim dispela tok na ol i bruk tupela lain gen.
Planti man i tok,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “He has a demon, and is insane! Why do you listen to him?”

block.text: "Spirit nogut i stap long em, na em i longlong. Watpo yupela i putim yau long tok bilong en?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: Others said,

block.text: Na sampela i tok,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “These are not the sayings of one possessed by a demon. It isn't possible for a demon to open the eyes of the blind, is it?”

block.text: "Dispela em i no tok bilong man i gat spirit nogut. Ating spirit nogut em inap long opim ai bilong ol man i aipas, a?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: It was the Feast of the Dedication at Jerusalem.

block.text: Long dispela taim i gat bikpela de bilong lotu i kamap long Jerusalem. Em de bilong tingim taim bipo ol i bin makim tempel i kamap haus bilong God yet. Em i save kamap long taim bilong kol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: It was winter, and Jesus was walking in the temple, in Solomon's porch.

block.text: Orait Jisas i wokabaut insait long banis bilong tempel, long veranda bilong Solomon.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The Jews therefore came around him and said to him,

block.text: Na ol Juda i kam sanap raun long em na ol i askim em olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “How long will you hold us in suspense? If you are the Christ, tell us plainly.”

block.text: "Wanem taim tru bai yu tokaut klia long mipela, yu husat tru? Sapos yu dispela man tasol God i bin makim bilong kisim bek ol manmeri bilong en, orait yu mas tokaut klia long mipela."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus answered them,

block.text: Na Jisas i bekim tok bilong ol olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “I told you, and you don't believe. The works that I do in my Father's name, these testify about me.

block.text: "Mi tokim yupela pinis, na yupela i no bilip. Olgeta wok mi mekim long nem bilong Papa bilong mi, dispela i soim yupela olsem mi husat tru.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But you don't believe, because you are not of my sheep, as I told you.

block.text: Tasol yupela i no bilong ol lain sipsip bilong mi. Olsem na yupela i no save bilip.

ReferenceBlocks.text: My sheep hear my voice, and I know them, and they follow me.

block.text: Ol sipsip bilong mi i save harim maus bilong mi, na mi save long ol, na ol i bihainim mi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I give eternal life to them. They will never perish, and no one will snatch them out of my hand.

block.text: Mi givim laip i stap gut oltaim oltaim long ol, na ol bai i no inap lus. Nogat tru. Na bai i no gat man inap rausim ol long han bilong mi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: My Father, who has given them to me, is greater than all. No one is able to snatch them out of my Father's hand.
I and the Father are one.”

block.text: Papa bilong mi i bin givim ol long mi. Na em i namba wan tru na i antap long olgeta samting. Olsem na i no gat wanpela man i ken rausim ol long han bilong em.
Na mi wantaim Papa mitupela i wanpela tasol."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Therefore Jews took up stones again to stone him.
Jesus answered them,

block.text: Ol Juda i harim dispela tok na ol i kisim ol ston gen bilong tromoi long em na kilim em i dai.
Na Jisas i tokim ol olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “I have shown you many good works from my Father. For which of those works do you stone me?”

block.text: "Mi bin soim yupela planti gutpela wok bilong Papa. Yupela i tingting long wanem bilong dispela ol wok na yupela i laik tromoi ston long mi?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: The Jews answered him,

block.text: Ol Juda i bekim tok long em olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “We don't stone you for a good work, but for blasphemy: because you, being a man, make yourself God.”

block.text: "Mipela i no ting long wanpela gutpela wok na mipela i laik tromoi ston long yu. Nogat. Yu laik kisim ples bilong God, na long dispela as mipela i laik tromoi ston long yu. Yu man nating, tasol yu tok olsem yu yet yu God."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus answered them,

block.text: Orait Jisas i bekim tok bilong ol olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Isn't it written in your law, ‘I said, you are gods?’

block.text: "Long lo bilong yupela i gat wanpela tok bilong God i stap olsem, 'Mi tok olsem, "Yupela i god.'"

ReferenceBlocks.text: God called them gods to whom the word of God came (and the Scripture can't be broken).

block.text: Bipo God i bin autim dispela tok long ol man, na em i bin tok long ol i god. Na tok i stap long buk bilong God em i no save senis.

ReferenceBlocks.text: God has set me apart for Himself. He sent me into the world. Then how can you say that I am blaspheming because I said, ‘I am the Son of God’?

block.text: Tasol mi, Papa yet i bin makim mi, na em i salim mi na mi kam long graun. Olsem na taim mi tok, 'Mi Pikinini Bilong God,' watpo yupela i tok, 'Yu laik kisim ples bilong God'?

ReferenceBlocks.text: If I don't do the works of my Father, don't believe me.

block.text: "Sapos mi no mekim wok bilong Papa bilong mi, orait yupela i no ken bilipim tok bilong mi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But if I do them, though you don't believe me, believe the works; that you may know and believe that the Father is in me, and I in the Father.”

block.text: Tasol mi mekim wok bilong em. Na sapos yupela i no laik bilipim tok bilong mi, orait yupela i ken bilip long ol wok mi mekim. Olsem na yupela i ken kisim save na tingting gut olsem, Papa i stap long mi, na mi stap long Papa."

ReferenceBlocks.text: They sought again to seize him, and he went out of their hand.

block.text: Ol i laik holimpasim em gen, tasol em i abrusim ol na i go.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He went away again beyond the Jordan into the place where John was baptizing at first, and there he stayed.

block.text: Jisas i go bek gen na i brukim wara Jordan. Na em i go kamap long dispela ples bipo Jon i wok long baptaisim ol man, na em i stap long dispela ples.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Many came to him. They said,

block.text: Na planti manmeri i kam long em. Na ol i tok,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “John indeed did no sign, but everything that John said about this man is true.”

block.text: "Tru, Jon i no bin wokim wanpela mirakel olsem mak bilong strongim tok bilong en. Tasol olgeta tok Jon i bin mekim long dispela man em i tru tasol."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Many believed in him there.

block.text: Na long taim Jisas i stap long dispela hap, planti man i bilip long em.

ReferenceBlocks.text: JOHN CHP 11
Now a certain man was sick, Lazarus from Bethany, of the village of Mary and her sister, Martha.

block.text: Wanpela man i gat sik, em Lasarus bilong ples Betani. Betani em i ples bilong Maria wantaim susa bilong en Marta.

ReferenceBlocks.text: It was that Mary who had anointed the Lord with ointment and wiped his feet with her hair. It was her brother Lazarus who was sick.

block.text: Em dispela Maria tasol i bin kapsaitim sanda long lek bilong Bikpela, na mekim drai long gras bilong em yet. Lasarus, em dispela man i gat sik, em i brata bilong Maria tupela Marta.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The sisters therefore sent to him, saying,

block.text: Orait na tupela susa i salim tok long Jisas olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Lord, behold, he for whom you have great affection is sick.”

block.text: "Bikpela, dispela man yu laikim tumas, em i gat sik."

ReferenceBlocks.text: But when Jesus heard it, he said,

block.text: Jisas i harim dispela na em i tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “This sickness is not to death, but for the glory of God, that God's Son may be glorified by it.”

block.text: "Dispela sik em I no bilong man i dai. Nogat. Em i bilong mekim ol manmeri i lukim strong bilong God na givim biknem long em. Na long dispela rot tasol Pikinini Bilong God tu bai i kisim biknem."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now Jesus loved Martha, and her sister, and Lazarus.

block.text: Jisas i laikim tumas Marta wantaim susa bilong en na Lasarus.

ReferenceBlocks.text: When therefore he heard that he was sick, he stayed two days in the place where he was.

block.text: Na taim em i harim tok long Lasarus i gat sik, em i stap tupela de moa long dispela ples em i stap long en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Then after this he said to the disciples,

block.text: Na bihain em i tokim ol disaipel,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Let's go into Judea again.”

block.text: "Yumi go bek long distrik Judia."

ReferenceBlocks.text: The disciples told him,

block.text: Na ol disaipel i tokim em,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Rabbi, the Jews were just trying to stone you, and are you going there again?”

block.text: "Tisa, i no longtaim i go pinis na ol Juda i laik tromoi ston long yu na kilim yu i dai. Na yu laik i go long Judia, a?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus answered,

block.text: Tasol Jisas i bekim tok bilong ol olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Aren't there twelve hours of daylight? If a man walks in the day, he doesn't stumble, because he sees the light of this world.

block.text: "Ating i no gat 12 -pela aua long wanpela san, a? Sapos man i wokabaut long san, em i no save pundaun, long wanem, em i lukim lait bilong dispela graun.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But if a man walks in the night, he stumbles, because the light isn't in him.”

block.text: Tasol sapos man i wokabaut long nait, em i save pundaun, long wanem, em i no gat lait bilong lukluk."

ReferenceBlocks.text: He said these things, and after that, he said to them,

block.text: Jisas i tok olsem, na bihain gen em i tokim ol,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Our friend, Lazarus, has fallen asleep, but I am going so that I may awake him out of sleep.”

block.text: "Pren bilong yumi Lasarus i slip. Tasol mi bai go na kirapim em."

ReferenceBlocks.text: The disciples therefore said,

block.text: Ol disaipel i harim dispela tok na ol i tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Lord, if he has fallen asleep, he will recover.”

block.text: "Bikpela, sapos em i slip, sik bilong en bai i pinis na em bai i kamap orait gen."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now Jesus had spoken of his death, but they thought that he spoke of taking rest in sleep.

block.text: Ol disaipel i no save olsem Jisas i tok long Lasarus i dai pinis. Ol i ting Jisas I tok long Lasarus i slip tasol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: So Jesus said to them plainly then,

block.text: Olsem na nau Jisas i tok klia long ol olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Lazarus is dead.
I am glad for your sakes that I was not there, so that you may believe. Nevertheless, let's go to him.”

block.text: "Lasarus i dai pinis.
Tasol mi tingting long yupela na mi amamas long mi no bin i stap wantaim em long dispela taim. Long wanem, dispela bai i mekim yupela i bilip. Nau yumi go long em."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Thomas therefore, who is called Didymus, said to his fellow disciples,

block.text: Jisas i tok pinis, orait Tomas, narapela nem bilong en Didimus, em i tokim ol arapela disaipel olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Let's go also, that we may die with him.”

block.text: "Goan, yumi olgeta i go na i dai wantaim em."

ReferenceBlocks.text: So when Jesus came, the people told him:

block.text: Orait Jisas wantaim ol disaipel bilong en i go kamap klostu long ples Betani, na Jisas i harim tok olsem em i

block.characterId: person near Lazarus' grave who informed Jesus

ReferenceBlocks.characterId: person near Lazarus' grave who informed Jesus
ReferenceBlocks.text: “Lazarus has been in the tomb for four days.”

block.text: namba 4 de bilong Lasarus i stap long matmat.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now Bethany was near Jerusalem, about fifteen stadia away.

block.text: Betani i stap klostu long Jerusalem, inap olsem 3 kilomita tasol,

ReferenceBlocks.text: Many of the Jews had joined the women around Martha and Mary, to console them concerning their brother.

block.text: olsem na planti manmeri bilong Juda i bin kam i stap wantaim Marta tupela Maria, bilong mekim gut bel bilong tupela, taim brata bilong tupela i dai.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Then when Martha heard that Jesus was coming, she went and met him, but Mary stayed in the house.

block.text: Marta i harim tok long Jisas i wokabaut i kam, na em i lusim Maria i stap long haus na em i go bungim Jisas long rot.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Therefore Martha said to Jesus,

block.text: Na Marta i tokim Jisas olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Lord, if you would have been here, my brother wouldn't have died.

block.text: "Bikpela, sapos yu bin i stap hia, bai brata bilong mi i no inap i dai.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Even now I know that God will give you whatever you ask of Him.”

block.text: Tasol nau tu mi save, sapos yu beten long God long wanpela samting, orait em bai i givim long yu."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus said to her,

block.text: Jisas i tokim em,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Your brother will rise again.”

block.text: "Brata bilong yu bai i kirap bek."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Martha said to him,

block.text: Na Marta i tokim em,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “I know that he will rise again in the resurrection at the last day.”

block.text: "Mi save, em bai i kirap bek long las de, long dispela taim olgeta manmeri bai i kirap bek."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus said to her,

block.text: Na Jisas i tokim em,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “I am the resurrection and the life. He who believes in me will still live, even if he dies.

block.text: "Kirap bek, em mi yet. Na laip, em mi yet. Na man i bilip long mi, maski sapos em i dai, em bai i stap laip yet.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Whoever lives and believes in me will never die. Do you believe this?”

block.text: Na olgeta man i stap laip na i bilip long mi, bai ol i no i dai. Nogat. Bai ol i stap laip oltaim oltaim. Yu bilipim dispela, o nogat?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: She said to him,

block.text: Na Marta i tokim Jisas olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Yes, Lord. I have come to believe that you are the Christ, God's Son, he who comes into the world.”

block.text: "Yes, Bikpela. Mi bilip yu Pikinini Bilong God. Yu dispela man God i bin tok long em bai i salim i kam long graun bilong kisim bek ol manmeri bilong en."

ReferenceBlocks.text: When she had said this, she went away, and called Mary, her sister, secretly, saying,

block.text: Marta i tok olsem, na em i go singautim susa bilong en Maria. Na em i i tok isi long yau bilong Maria olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “The Teacher is here, and is calling you.”

block.text: "Tisa i kam I stap, na em i singautim yu."

ReferenceBlocks.text: When she heard this, she arose quickly, and went to him.

block.text: Maria i harim dispela, na kwiktaim em i kirap bilong i go lukim Jisas.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now Jesus had not yet come into the village, but was in the place where Martha met him.

block.text: Jisas i no kamap yet long ples. Em i stap yet long dispela hap, pastaim Marta i bin bungim em long en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Then the Jews who were with her in the house, consoling her, when they saw Mary, that she rose up quickly and went out, followed her, supposing she was going to the tomb to mourn there.

block.text: Ol Juda i stap wantaim Maria long haus na i wok long sori wantaim em, ol i lukim em i kirap kwiktaim na i go ausait. Na ol i bihainim em i go, long wanem, ol i ting em i laik i go krai long matmat.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Therefore when Mary came to where Jesus was, and saw him, she fell down at his feet, saying to him,

block.text: Maria i go kamap long dispela hap Jisas i stap long en, na em i lukim Jisas. Na em i brukim skru klostu long lek bilong em, na i tokim em olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Lord, if you would have been here, my brother wouldn't have died.”

block.text: "Bikpela, sapos yu bin i stap hia, bai brata bilong mi i no inap i dai."

ReferenceBlocks.text: When Jesus therefore saw her weeping, and the Jews weeping who came with her, he groaned in the spirit, and was troubled,
and said,

block.text: Jisas i lukim Maria i krai, na em i lukim ol Juda i kam wantaim Maria, ol tu i krai. Na bel bilong en i sori tru na em tu i laik krai.
Na em i tok,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Where have you laid him?”

block.text: "Yupela i bin putim em we?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: They told him,

block.text: Na ol I tokim em,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Lord, come and see.”

block.text: "Bikpela, yu kam lukim."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus wept.
The Jews therefore said,

block.text: Na Jisas i krai.
Ol Juda i lukim na ol i tok,

block.characterId: Jews who had been with Mary and Martha

ReferenceBlocks.characterId: Jews who had been with Mary and Martha
ReferenceBlocks.text: “See how much affection he had for him!”

block.text: "Lukim. Em i bin laikim tru dispela man."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Some of them said,

block.text: Tasol sampela i tok,

block.characterId: Jews who had been with Mary and Martha, some

ReferenceBlocks.characterId: Jews who had been with Mary and Martha, some
ReferenceBlocks.text: “Couldn't this man, who opened the eyes of him who was blind, have also kept this man from dying?”

block.text: "Em i bin opim ai bilong ol aipas na mekim ol i lukluk. Tasol bilong wanem em i no laik helpim dispela man bai em i no dai?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus therefore, again groaning in himself, came to the tomb. Now it was a cave, and a stone lay against it.
Jesus said,

block.text: Orait Jisas i bel hevi tru, na em i go kamap long matmat. Dispela matmat em wanpela hul bilong ston ol i bin wokim long maunten. Na wanpela bikpela ston i karamapim maus bilong en.
Orait Jisas i tok,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Take away the stone.”

block.text: "Yupela rausim dispela ston."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Martha, the sister of him who was dead, said to him,

block.text: Marta, em susa bilong man i dai pinis, em i tokim Jisas olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Lord, by this time there is a stench, for he has been dead four days.”

block.text: "Bikpela, nau em i namba 4 de bilong em i stap long matmat. Olsem na smel nogut bai i kamap."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus said to her,

block.text: Na Jisas i tokim em,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Didn't I tell you that if you believed, you would see God's glory?”
