block.text: "Pastaim mi tokim yu pinis, sapos yu bilip, orait yu bai lukim bikpela strong bilong God."

ReferenceBlocks.text: So they took away the stone from the place where the dead man was lying. Jesus lifted up his eyes, and said,

block.text: Orait ol i rausim ston. Na Jisas i lukluk i go antap na em i tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Father, I thank you that you have heard me.

block.text: "Papa, mi tenkyu long yu, long wanem, yu harim pinis beten bilong mi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I know that you always hear me, but because of the multitude that stands around I said this, that they may believe that you sent me.”

block.text: Mi save pinis oltaim yu save harim beten bilong mi. Tasol mi ting long ol manmeri i sanap hia na mi mekim dispela tok, bilong ol i ken save yu bin salim mi na mi kam."

ReferenceBlocks.text: When he had said this, he cried with a loud voice,

block.text: Jisas i tok pinis, na em i singaut strong,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Lazarus, come out!”

block.text: "Lasarus, yu kam ausait."

ReferenceBlocks.text: He who was dead came out, bound hand and foot with wrappings, and his face was wrapped around with a cloth. Jesus said to them,

block.text: Orait Lasarus i kirap bek na i kam ausait. Lek na han na pes bilong en ol i bin karamapim long laplap. Na nau Jisas i tokim ol olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Free him, and let him go.”

block.text: "Lusim laplap na larim em i wokabaut."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Therefore many of the Jews, who came to Mary and saw what Jesus did, believed in him.

block.text: Planti bilong ol dispela Juda i bin kam sori wantaim Maria, ol i lukim dispela samting Jisas i mekim, na ol i bilip long em.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But some of them went away to the Pharisees, and told them the things which Jesus had done.

block.text: Tasol sampela bilong ol i go long ol Farisi na i tokim ol long dispela samting Jisas i bin mekim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The chief priests therefore and the Pharisees gathered a council, and said,

block.text: Olsem na ol bikpris wantaim ol Farisi ol i singautim ol kaunsil i kam bung na ol i tokim ol olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “What are we going to do? This man does many signs.
If we leave him alone like this, everyone will believe in him, and the Romans will come and take away both our place and our nation.”

block.text: "Bai yumi mekim wanem? Dispela man i save wokim planti mirakel.
Sapos yumi larim em i mekim dispela kain pasin, orait bai olgeta manmeri bai i bilip long em. Na ol Rom bai i kam na bagarapim tempel bilong yumi wantaim ol lain bilong yumi."

ReferenceBlocks.text: But a certain one of them, Caiaphas, being high priest that year, said to them,

block.text: Tasol wanpela man namel long ol, nem bilong en Kaiafas, em i hetpris long dispela yia, em i tokim ol olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “You know nothing at all,
nor do you consider that it is advantageous for us that one man should die for the people, and that the whole nation not perish.”

block.text: "Yupela i no gat tingting tru.
Ating yupela i no save long wanpela pasin em inap helpim yupela. I gutpela sapos wanpela man tasol i kisim ples bilong ol manmeri na i dai, nogut olgeta lain bilong yumi i lus."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now he didn't say this of himself, but being high priest that year, he prophesied that Jesus would die for the nation,

block.text: Kaiafas i no mekim dispela tok long tingting bilong em yet. Nogat. Em i stap hetpris long dispela yia, olsem na em i mekim dispela tok profet long Jisas bai i dai bilong helpim ol Juda.

ReferenceBlocks.text: and not for the nation only, but that he might also gather together into one the children of God who are scattered abroad.

block.text: Na Jisas i no i dai bilong helpim ol Juda tasol. Nogat. Em i dai bilong bungim olgeta pikinini bilong God i stap nabaut, na mekim ol i kamap wanpela lain tasol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: So from that day forward they took counsel that they might put him to death.

block.text: Orait long dispela de tasol ol bikman i stat long wokim toktok bilong painim rot bilong kilim Jisas i dai.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus therefore walked no more openly among the Jews, but departed from there into the country near the wilderness, to a city called Ephraim. He stayed there with his disciples.

block.text: Olsem na Jisas i no wokabaut moa long ples klia namel long ol Juda. Em i lusim dispela ples na em i go i stap klostu long ples i no gat man, long wanpela taun ol i kolim Efraim. Na em i stap long dispela taun wantaim ol disaipel bilong en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now the Passover of the Jews was at hand. Many went up from the country to Jerusalem before the Passover, to purify themselves.

block.text: Bikpela De Bilong Tingim De God I Larim Ol Israel I Stap Gut, klostu em i laik kamap. Olsem na planti manmeri bilong ol ples nabaut ol i go long Jerusalem bilong mekim ol yet i kamap klin long ai bilong God.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Then they sought for Jesus and spoke one with another, as they stood in the temple,

block.text: Na ol i wok long painim Jisas. Ol i sanap insait long banis bilong tempel na ol i i toktok namel long ol yet olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “What do you think--that he isn't coming to the feast at all?”

block.text: "Yupela i ting wanem? Em bai i kam lukim ol bikpela de bilong lotu, o nogat?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now the chief priests and the Pharisees had commanded that if anyone knew where he was, he should report it, that they might seize him.

block.text: Ol bikman wantaim ol Farisi ol i tokim ol manmeri pinis olsem, sapos wanpela man i save Jisas em i stap we, orait em i mas toksave long ol na bai ol i ken kalabusim em.

ReferenceBlocks.text: JOHN CHP 12
Then six days before the Passover, Jesus came to Bethany, where Lazarus was, who had been dead, whom he raised from the dead.

block.text: Orait 6 -pela de i stap yet, na ol bikpela de bilong lotu bai i kamap. Long dispela taim Jisas i go long Betani. Betani em i ples bilong Lasarus, em dispela man Jisas i bin kirapim long matmat.

ReferenceBlocks.text: So they made him a supper there. Martha served, but Lazarus was one of those who sat at the table with him.

block.text: Ol i wokim kaikai bilong amamasim Jisas long dispela ples. Na Marta i wok long sutim kaikai, na Lasarus i sindaun wantaim ol man i kaikai wantaim Jisas.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Mary, therefore, took a pound of ointment of pure nard, very precious, and anointed the feet of Jesus, and wiped his feet with her hair. The house was filled with the fragrance of the ointment.

block.text: Orait Maria i kisim hap kilo nambawan sanda, em i dia tumas, na em i kam welim lek bilong Jisas, na em i mekim drai long gras bilong het bilong em yet. Na gutpela smel bilong dispela sanda i karamapim haus olgeta.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Then Judas Iscariot, Simon's son, one of his disciples, who would betray him, said,

block.text: Tasol wanpela disaipel bilong en, em Judas Iskariot, em dispela man bihain em i putim Jisas long han bilong ol birua, em i tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Why wasn't this ointment sold for three hundred denarii, and given to the poor?”

block.text: "Bilong wanem yumi no larim ol man i baim dispela sanda na yumi kisim 300 mani silva long en, na yumi givim long ol rabisman?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now he said this, not because he cared for the poor, but because he was a thief, and having the money box, used to steal what was put into it.
But Jesus said,

block.text: Judas i no wari long ol rabisman na em i tok olsem. Nogat. Em i stilman. Em i gat wok bilong bosim bokis mani bilong ol lain bilong Jisas, na em i save stilim mani ol i putim long en.
Jisas i harim dispela tok na em i tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Leave her alone. She has kept this for the day of my burial.

block.text: "Larim dispela meri. Em i ken holim dispela sanda inap long de mi dai na ol i planim mi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For you always have the poor with you, but you don't always have me.”

block.text: Ol rabisman bai i stap wantaim yupela oltaim. Tasol mi, bai mi no inap i stap wantaim yupela oltaim."

ReferenceBlocks.text: A large crowd therefore of the Jews learned that he was there, and they came, not for Jesus’ sake only, but that they might see Lazarus also, whom he had raised from the dead.

block.text: Ol bikpela lain Juda ol i save, Jisas i stap long ples Betani, na ol i kam long em. Na ol i no i kam bilong lukim Jisas tasol. Nogat. Ol i save, bipo Jisas i bin kirapim Lasarus long matmat, na ol i laik lukim Lasarus tu.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But the chief priests conspired to put Lazarus to death also.

block.text: Olsem na ol bikpris i wokim toktok long kilim Lasarus tu i dai,

ReferenceBlocks.text: because on account of Lazarus many of the Jews went away and believed in Jesus.

block.text: long wanem, planti Juda i ting long samting Jisas i bin mekim long Lasarus, na ol i lusim ol bikpris na ol i bilip long Jisas.

ReferenceBlocks.text: On the next day a great multitude had come to the feast. When they heard that Jesus was coming to Jerusalem,
they took the branches of the palm trees, and went out to meet him, and cried out,

block.text: Bikpela lain manmeri i kam i stap long Jerusalem bilong lukim ol bikpela de bilong lotu. Na long de bihain long Jisas i bin kaikai long haus bilong Lasarus, ol manmeri i harim tok olsem, klostu Jisas i laik kamap long Jerusalem.
Olsem na ol i kisim ol han bilong diwai pam na ol i go bungim em long rot. Na ol i singaut olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Hosanna! Blessed is he who comes in the name of the Lord, the King of Israel!”

block.text: "Amamas long God. God i ken mekim gut long dispela man i kam long nem bilong Bikpela. Em i king bilong Israel."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus, having found a young donkey, sat on it. As it is written,

block.text: Na Jisas i kisim wanpela donki na i sindaun long en. Em i olsem tok i stap long buk bilong God,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Don't be afraid, daughter of Zion. Behold, your King comes, sitting on a donkey's colt.”

block.text: "Yupela ol manmeri bilong taun Saion, yupela i no ken pret. Lukim. King bilong yupela em i kam nau. Em i sindaun long yangpela donki na i kam."

ReferenceBlocks.text: His disciples didn't understand these things at first, but when Jesus was glorified, then they remembered that these things were written about him, and that they had done these things to him.

block.text: Pastaim ol disaipel bilong en, ol i no save long as bilong dispela tok. Tasol bihain long God i givim biknem pinis long Jisas, ol i tingim dispela tok i stap long buk bilong God, na ol i save, em i tok long Jisas stret. Na ol i tingim gen dispela samting ol man i bin mekim long em.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The multitude therefore that was with him when he called Lazarus out of the tomb, and raised him from the dead, was testifying about it.

block.text: Taim Lasarus i dai pinis na i stap long matmat, planti manmeri i bin stap wantaim Jisas na ol i lukim em i singautim Lasarus na kirapim em long matmat. Nau ol dispela manmeri i wok long autim tok long dispela samting Jisas i bin mekim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For this cause also the multitude went and met him, because they heard that he had done this sign.

block.text: Ol manmeri i harim tok long em i bin wokim dispela mirakel, olsem na ol i go bungim em long rot.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The Pharisees therefore said among themselves,

block.text: Ol Farisi i lukim, na ol i toktok namel long ol yet olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “See, this is getting us nowhere. The whole world is going after him!”

block.text: "Lukim. Dispela samting yumi laik mekim, em i no inap kamap nau. Olgeta manmeri i go bihainim em."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now there were certain Greeks among those that went up to worship at the feast.

block.text: Namel long ol lain manmeri i bin kam long Jerusalem bilong mekim lotu long God long dispela bikpela de bilong lotu i gat sampela Grik tu i stap.

ReferenceBlocks.text: These, therefore, came to Philip, who was from Bethsaida of Galilee, and asked him, saying,

block.text: Orait dispela ol Grik i kam long Filip, em dispela man bilong taun Betsaida long Galili. Na ol i tokim em olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Sir, we want to see Jesus.”

block.text: "Bikman, mipela i laik lukim Jisas."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Philip came and told Andrew, and in turn, Andrew came with Philip, and they told Jesus.
Jesus answered them,

block.text: Orait Filip i go tokim Andru. Na Andru wantaim Filip tupela i go tokim Jisas.
Na Jisas i bekim tok bilong tupela olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “The time has come for the Son of Man to be glorified.

block.text: "Taim bilong Pikinini Bilong Man i laik kisim biknem, em i kamap pinis nau.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Most certainly I tell you, unless a grain of wheat falls into the earth and dies, it remains by itself alone. But if it dies, it bears much fruit.

block.text: Tru tumas mi tokim yupela, sapos pikinini wit i no pundaun long graun na i dai, orait em wanpela tasol bai i stap. Tasol sapos em i dai, orait em bai i kamap na karim planti kaikai.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He who loves his life will lose it. He who hates his life in this world will keep it to eternal life.

block.text: Sapos wanpela man i laikim tumas laip bilong em yet, laip bilong en bai i lus. Tasol sapos wanpela man i givim baksait long laip bilong en long dispela graun, orait em bai i holimpas laip bilong en inap oltaim oltaim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: If anyone serves me, let him follow me. Where I am, there will my servant also be. If anyone serves me, the Father will honor him.”

block.text: Sapos wanpela man i mekim wok bilong mi, em i mas bihainim mi. Na long ples mi stap long en, wokman bilong mi tu bai i stap wantaim mi. Sapos man i mekim wok bilong mi, orait Papa bai i givim biknem long em."

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Now my soul is troubled. What shall I say? ‘Father, save me from this time?’ But for this cause I came to this time.
Father, glorify your name!”

block.text: Jisas i tok moa olsem, "Nau bel bilong mi i hevi na mi tingting planti. Na bai mi tok wanem? Ating bai mi tok, 'Papa, yu ken tekewe dispela samting i laik kamap long mi nau'? Nogat. Mi no ken tok olsem. Dispela taim bilong hevi i mas kamap long mi. Long dispela as tasol mi kam.
Papa, yu ken mekim nem bilong yu i kamap bikpela."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Then there came a voice out of the sky, saying,

block.text: Jisas i tok pinis na wanpela tok i kam daun long heven olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “I have both glorified it, and will glorify it again.”

block.text: "Mi mekim nem bilong mi i kamap bikpela pinis, na bai mi mekim olsem gen."

ReferenceBlocks.text: The multitude therefore, who stood by and heard it, said:

block.text: Ol manmeri i sanap klostu, ol i harim dispela tok, na ol i tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “It is thunder!”

block.text: "Klaut i pairap."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Others said,

block.text: Na sampela i tok,

block.characterId: crowd preparing for Passover Feast, others

ReferenceBlocks.characterId: crowd preparing for Passover Feast, others
ReferenceBlocks.text: “An angel has spoken to him.”

block.text: "Wanpela ensel I toktok long em."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus answered,

block.text: Jisas i bekim tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “This voice hasn't come for my sake, but for your sakes.

block.text: "Dispela tok nau yupela i harim, em i no bilong helpim mi. Nogat. Em i bilong helpim yupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now is the judgment of this world. Now the prince of this world will be cast out.

block.text: Nau bai God i skelim pasin bilong ol manmeri bilong dispela graun. Nau bai em i rausim dispela hetman i save bosim dispela graun.

ReferenceBlocks.text: And when I am lifted up from the earth, I will draw all people to myself.”

block.text: Nau mi stap long graun, tasol bihain bai ol i litimapim mi, na long dispela taim bai mi pulim olgeta manmeri i kam long mi."

ReferenceBlocks.text: But he said this, signifying by what kind of death he should die.
The multitude answered him,

block.text: Jisas i mekim dispela tok bilong tokaut long pasin em bai i dai long en.
Orait na ol manmeri i bekim tok bilong em olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “We have heard out of the law that the Christ remains forever. How do you say, ‘The Son of Man must be lifted up?’ Who is this Son of Man?”

block.text: "Mipela i harim tok olsem long lo bilong God, taim dispela man God i makim bilong kisim bek ol manmeri bilong en, em i kamap, orait em bai i stap oltaim oltaim. Orait olsem wanem na yu tok, 'Ol i mas litimapim Pikinini Bilong Man'? Dispela Pikinini Bilong Man em i husat tru?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus therefore said to them,

block.text: Na Jisas i tokim ol olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Yet a little while the light is with you. Walk while you have the light, that darkness doesn't overtake you. He who walks in the darkness doesn't know where he is going.

block.text: "Liklik taim tasol bai lait i stap yet wantaim yupela. Nau yupela i gat lait yet, olsem na yupela i mas wokabaut long lait, nogut tudak i karamapim yupela. Man i wokabaut long tudak, em i no save, em i go we.

ReferenceBlocks.text: While you have the light, believe in the light, that you may become children of light.”

block.text: lait i stap yet wantaim yupela, olsem na yupela i mas bilip long lait, na bai yupela i kamap pikinini bilong lait."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus said these things, and he departed and hid himself from them.

block.text: Jisas i toktok wantaim ol manmeri pinis, orait em i lusim ol na i go hait long ol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But though he had done so many signs before them, yet they didn't believe in him.

block.text: Ol i bin lukim em i wokim planti mirakel o mak, tasol ol I no bilip long em.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Therefore the word of Isaiah the prophet was fulfilled, which he spoke,

block.text: Olsem na tok bilong profet Aisaia i kamap tru. Aisaia i bin tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Lord, who has believed our report? To whom has the arm of the Lord been revealed?”

block.text: "Bikpela, husat i bilipim tok bilong mipela? Na husat i bin lukim Bikpela i mekim kain strongpela wok olsem nau em i mekim?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: For this cause they couldn't believe, for Isaiah said again,

block.text: Ol i no inap bilip long Jisas. As bilong dispela em Aisaia i raitim long narapela tok. Em i bin tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “He has blinded their eyes and he hardened their heart, lest they should see with their eyes, and perceive with their heart, and would turn, and I would heal them.”

block.text: "God i mekim ai bilong ol i no inap lukluk, na em i mekim tingting bilong ol i pas, nogut ai bilong ol i lukim wanpela samting na bel bilong ol i save long as bilong tok, na ol i tanim bel na kam bek long mi na mi mekim ol i kamap orait gen."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Isaiah said these things when he saw his glory, and spoke of him.

block.text: Aisaia i lukim bikpela namba na strong bilong Jisas na em i mekim dispela tok long Jisas tasol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Nevertheless even of the rulers many believed in him, but because of the Pharisees they didn't confess it, so that they wouldn't be put out of the synagogue.

block.text: Tru, planti hetman tu ol i bilip long Jisas. Tasol ol i pret long ol Farisi, na ol i no tokaut long bilip bilong ol. Ol i pret, nogut ol Farisi i tambuim ol long lotu wantaim ol arapela Juda.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They loved men's praise more than God's praise.
Jesus cried out and said,

block.text: Ol i laikim tumas bai ol man i litimapim nem bilong ol. Ol i no laik bai God i litimapim nem bilong ol.
Jisas i tokaut strong olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Whoever believes in me, believes not in me, but in him who sent me.

block.text: "Man i bilip long mi, em i no bilip long mi tasol. Em i bilip long Papa, em i bin salim mi na mi kam.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He who sees me sees him who sent me.

block.text: Na man i lukim mi, em i lukim Papa i bin salim mi na mi kam.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I have come as a light into the world, that whoever believes in me may not remain in the darkness.

block.text: Mi kam long dispela graun olsem lait, bilong olgeta man i bilip long mi ol i no ken i stap long tudak.

ReferenceBlocks.text: If anyone listens to my sayings, and doesn't believe, I don't judge him. For I came not to judge the world, but to save the world.

block.text: Sapos wanpela man i harim tok bilong mi na em i no bihainim, orait bai mi no skelim em olsem jas. Mi no kam bilong mi stap jas bilong ol man-meri bilong graun. Nogat. Mi kam bilong kisim bek ol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He who rejects me, and doesn't receive my sayings, has one who judges him. The word that I spoke, the same will judge him in the last day.

block.text: Tasol man i givim baksait long mi na i no kisim tok bilong mi, em i gat jas bilong skelim em. Tok mi bin autim, em bai i stap jas bilong dis\-pela man long las de

ReferenceBlocks.text: For I spoke not from myself, but the Father who sent me, he gave me a commandment, what I should say, and what I should speak.

block.text: no mekim tok long tingting bilong mi yet. Nogat. Papa i bin salim mi na mi kam, em yet i tokim mi long olgeta tok mi mas mekim na autim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I know that his commandment is eternal life. The things therefore which I speak, even as the Father has said to me, so I speak.”

block.text: Na mi save, tok bilong Papa em i save kamapim laip i stap gut oltaim oltaim. Olsem na olgeta tok mi mekim, em mi save mekim olsem Papa i bin tokim mi."

ReferenceBlocks.text: JOHN CHP 13
Now before the feast of the Passover, Jesus, knowing that his time had come that he would depart from this world to the Father, having loved his own who were in the world, he loved them to the end.

block.text: De bilong kaikai abus bilong tingim De God I Larim Ol Israel I Stap Gut em i no kamap yet, na Jisas i save, taim i kamap pinis bilong em i mas lusim dispela graun na i go long Papa. Em i laikim tumas ol manmeri bilong en i stap long dispela graun, na em i laikim ol moa yet i go inap long taim em i dai.

ReferenceBlocks.text: During supper, the devil having already put into the heart of Judas Iscariot, Simon's son, to betray him,

block.text: Long apinun tru ol i kaikai i stap. Satan i putim tingting pinis long bel bilong Judas, em pikinini bilong Saimon Iskariot, bilong em i mas putim Jisas long han bilong ol birua.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus knew that the Father had given all things into his hands, and that he came forth from God, and was going to God.

block.text: Jisas i save olsem, Papa i bin givim olgeta samting long han bilong Jisas yet. Em i save tu olsem, God i bin salim em i kam, na bai em i go bek long God.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He arose from supper and laid aside his outer garments. He took a towel, and wrapped a towel around his waist.

block.text: Olsem na Jisas i kirap na lusim kaikai, na em i rausim longpela klos bilong en, na i kisim wanpela taul na i pasim long bel bilong en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Then he poured water into the basin, and began to wash the disciples’ feet, and to wipe them with the towel that was wrapped around him.

block.text: Na em i kapsaitim wara long wanpela dis, na em i stat long wasim lek bilong ol disaipel na mekim drai long taul em i bin pasim long bel bilong en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Then he came to Simon Peter. He said to him,

block.text: Orait em i kam long Saimon Pita. Na Pita i askim em,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Lord, do you wash my feet?”

block.text: "Bikpela, ating yu laik wasim lek bilong mi?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus answered him,

block.text: Na Jisas i bekim tok bilong em olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “You don't know what I am doing now, but you will understand later.”

block.text: "Samting mi mekim, nau yu no klia long en. Tasol bihain bai yu klia."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Peter said to him,

block.text: Na Pita i tokim em,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “You will never wash my feet!”

block.text: "Yu no ken wasim lek bilong mi. I no ken tru."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus answered him,

block.text: Na Jisas i bekim tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “If I don't wash you, you have no part with me.”

block.text: "Sapos mi no wasim yu, orait yu no inap i stap wantaim mi."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Simon Peter said to him,

block.text: Na Saimon Pita i tokim em,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Lord, not my feet only, but also my hands and my head!”

block.text: "Bikpela, sapos olsem, orait yu no ken wasim lek bilong mi tasol. Yu mas wasim han na het tu wantaim."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus said to him,

block.text: Na Jisas i tokim em,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Someone who has bathed only needs to have his feet washed, but is completely clean. You are clean, but not all of you.”

block.text: "Man i waswas pinis em i no mas waswas gen. Nogat. Em i wasim lek tasol, na em bai i klin olgeta. Na yupela i stap klin pinis. Tasol mi no tok long yupela olgeta."

ReferenceBlocks.text: For he knew him who would betray him, therefore he said, “You are not all clean.”

block.text: Jisas i save pinis long dispela man i laik givim em long han bilong ol birua. Olsem na em i tok, "I no yupela olgeta i stap klin."

ReferenceBlocks.text: So when he had washed their feet, put his outer garment back on, and sat down again, he said to them,

block.text: Jisas i wasim pinis lek bilong ol, na em i putim longpela klos bilong en na i sindaun gen. Na em i askim ol olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Do you know what I have done to you?

block.text: "Ating yupela i save long as bilong dispela samting mi mekim long yupela?

ReferenceBlocks.text: You call me, ‘Teacher’ and ‘Lord.’ You say so correctly, for so I am.

block.text: Yupela i save kolim mi Tisa na Bikpela. Na i gutpela yupela i tok olsem. Mi Tisa na mi Bikpela bilong yupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: If I then, the Lord and the Teacher has washed your feet, you also ought to wash one another's feet.

block.text: Mi Bikpela na mi Tisa, na mi wasim lek bilong yupela. Orait yupela tu i mas wasim lek bilong ol arapela man bilong lain bilong yumi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For I have given you an example, that you also should do as I have done to you.

block.text: Mi soim pasin long yupela, na yupela tu i mas mekim wankain pasin olsem nau mi mekim long yupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Most certainly I tell you, a servant is not greater than his lord, neither one who is sent greater than he who sent him.

block.text: Tru tumas mi tokim yupela, wokboi i no winim bikman bilong en. Na man i go long wanpela wok, em i no stap antap long man i bin salim em i go.

ReferenceBlocks.text: If you know these things, blessed are you if you do them.

block.text: Nau yupela i save pinis long as tingting bilong dispela pasin mi mekim, na sapos yupela i bihainim gut, orait yupela i ken amamas.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I don't speak concerning all of you. I know whom I have chosen. But that the Scripture may be fulfilled, ‘He who eats bread with me has lifted up his heel against me.’

block.text: "Mi no tok long yupela olgeta. Mi save long yupela ol man mi bin makim bilong mi, na mi save olsem tok i stap long buk bilong God, em bai i kamap tru. Dispela tok i olsem, 'Man i kaikai bret wantaim mi, em i litimapim lek bilong krungutim mi.'

ReferenceBlocks.text: From now on, I tell you before it happens, that when it happens, you may believe that I am he.

block.text: Dispela samting i no kamap yet na nau mi tokim yupela pinis long en. Olsem na bihain, taim em i kamap pinis, orait yupela i ken bilip olsem, Mi Yet Mi Stap Olsem.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Most certainly I tell you, he who receives whomever I send, receives me; and he who receives me, receives him who sent me.”

block.text: Tru tumas mi tokim yupela, man i kisim wokman mi bin salim i go, na i mekim gut long em, dispela man i kisim mi na i mekim gut long mi yet. Na man i kisim mi, em i kisim God, em i bin salim mi na mi kam."

ReferenceBlocks.text: When Jesus had said this, he was troubled in spirit, and testified,

block.text: Jisas i tok pinis na bel bilong en i hevi tumas. Na em i autim tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Most certainly I tell you that one of you will betray me.”

block.text: "Tru tumas mi tokim yupela, wanpela bilong yupela bai i givim mi long han bilong ol man i birua long mi."

ReferenceBlocks.text: The disciples looked at one another, perplexed about whom he spoke.

block.text: Em i tok olsem, na ol disaipel wan wan ol i lukluk long ol arapela. Ol i no save, em i tok long husat.

ReferenceBlocks.text: One of his disciples, whom Jesus loved, was at the table, leaning against Jesus’ breast.

block.text: Na dispela disaipel Jisas i save laikim tumas, em i stap klostu tru long Jisas.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Simon Peter therefore beckoned to him, and said to him,

block.text: Olsem na Saimon Pita i mekim nais long het bilong en na i tokim em,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Tell us who it is of whom he speaks.”

block.text: "Yu askim em, em i tok long husat."

ReferenceBlocks.text: He, leaning back, as he was, on Jesus’ breast, asked him,

block.text: Orait na dispela disaipel i putim het bilong en klostu long bros bilong Jisas na i askim em olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Lord, who is it?”

block.text: "Bikpela, yu tok long husat?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus therefore answered,

block.text: Na Jisas i bekim tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “It is he to whom I will give this piece of bread when I have dipped it.”

block.text: "Bai mi kisim dispela hap kaikai na putim long sup na givim long wanpela man. Em dispela man tasol mi tok long en."

ReferenceBlocks.text: So when he had dipped the piece of bread, he gave it to Judas, the son of Simon Iscariot.

block.text: Orait em i putim hap kaikai long sup, na i givim long Judas, pikinini bilong Saimon Iskariot.

ReferenceBlocks.text: After the piece of bread, then Satan entered into him. Then Jesus said to him,

block.text: Judas i kisim dispela kaikai pinis, na Satan i go insait long bel bilong em. Na Jisas i tokim em olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “What you do, do quickly.”

block.text: "Samting yu laik mekim, em yu mas mekim hariap."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now no man at the table knew why he said this to him.

block.text: Olgeta man i sindaun long tebol ol i harim dispela tok Jisas i givim long Judas, tasol ol i no save long as bilong tok.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For some thought, because Judas had the money box, that Jesus said to him, “Buy what things we need for the feast,” or that he should give something to the poor.

block.text: Judas i save lukautim bokis mani, na sampela i ting Jisas i tokim em long go baim ol samting bilong bikpela de bilong lotu, o long em i mas i go givim ol samting long ol rabisman.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Therefore having received that morsel, he went out immediately. It was night.

block.text: Orait Judas i kisim dispela hap kaikai pinis, na kwiktaim em i go ausait. Na ples i tudak pinis.

ReferenceBlocks.text: When he had gone out, Jesus said,

block.text: Judas i go ausait pinis, orait Jisas i tok,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Now the Son of Man has been glorified, and God has been glorified in him.

block.text: "Nau Pikinini Bilong Man em i kisim biknem. Na God i kisim biknem long Pikinini Bilong Man.

ReferenceBlocks.text: If God has been glorified in him, God will also glorify him in himself, and he will glorify him immediately.

block.text: Na taim God i kisim biknem long em, orait God yet bai i givim biknem long Pikinini Bilong Man, na em bai i mekim olsem wantu tasol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Little children, I will be with you a little while longer. You will seek me, and as I said to the Jews, ‘Where I am going, you can't come,’ so now I tell you.

block.text: Ol pikinini, liklik taim tasol bai mi stap wantaim yupela. Na bai yupela i wok long painim mi. Mi bin tokim ol Juda, na nau mi mekim wankain tok long yupela tu, yupela i no inap i go long ples mi go long en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: A new commandment I give to you, that you love one another, just like I have loved you; that you also love one another.

block.text: Na nau mi givim nupela lo long yupela olsem, yupela wan wan i mas laikim tru ol arapela. Mi bin laikim yupela tru, na olsem tasol yupela wan wan i mas laikim tru ol arapela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: By this everyone will know that you are my disciples, if you have love for one another.”

block.text: Sapos yupela wan wan i laikim tru ol arapela man bilong lain bilong mi, orait dispela bai i soim olgeta man olsem, yupela i disaipel bilong mi."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Simon Peter said to him,

block.text: Orait Saimon Pita i askim Jisas olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Lord, where are you going?”

block.text: "Bikpela, yu bai go we?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus answered,

block.text: Na Jisas i bekim tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Where I am going, you can't follow now, but you will follow afterwards.”

block.text: "Ples mi go long en, em nau yu no inap bihainim mi na yu go long en. Tasol bihain bai yu bihainim mi i kam."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Peter said to him,

block.text: Na Pita i askim em,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Lord, why can't I follow you now? I will lay down my life for you.”

block.text: "Bikpela, olsem wanem na mi no inap bihainim yu nau? Bai mi inap lusim laip bilong mi bilong helpim yu."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus answered him,

block.text: Na Jisas i bekim tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Will you lay down your life for me? Most certainly I tell you, the rooster won't crow until you have denied me three times.”

block.text: "Yu ting yu inap lusim laip bilong yu bilong helpim mi, a? Tru tumas mi tokim yu, taim kakaruk i no krai yet, yu bai tok tripela taim olsem, yu no save long mi."

ReferenceBlocks.text: JOHN CHP 14
“Don't let your heart be troubled. Believe in God. Believe also in me.

block.text: Jisas i tok moa olsem, "Yupela i no ken bel hevi na tingting planti. Yupela i bilip long God. Yupela i mas bilip long mi tu.

ReferenceBlocks.text: In my Father's house are many rooms. If it weren't so, I would have told you. I am going to prepare a place for you.

block.text: Long haus bilong Papa bilong mi i gat planti rum i stap, na mi go bilong redim ples bilong yupela. Sapos i no olsem, orait mi no inap mekim dispela tok long yupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: If I go and prepare a place for you, I will come again, and will receive you to myself; that where I am, you may be there also.

block.text: Na sapos mi go redim ples bilong yupela, bai mi kam bek na kisim yupela i go i stap wantaim mi. Na ples mi stap long en, yupela tu bai i stap long en wantaim mi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: You know where I am going, and you know how to get there.”

block.text: Na yupela i save pinis long rot bilong i go long dispela ples mi laik i go long en."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Thomas said to him,

block.text: Tomas i tokim em,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Lord, we don't know where you are going. How can we know the way?”

block.text: "Bikpela, yu go we, em mipela i no save. Olsem wanem na mipela inap save long rot?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus said to him,

block.text: Na Jisas i tokim em olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “I am the way, the truth, and the life. No one comes to the Father, except through me.

block.text: "Mi yet mi rot, na mi as bilong tok tru, na mi as bilong laip. I no gat wanpela man inap i kam long Papa long narapela rot. Nogat. Long mi tasol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: If you had known me, you would have known my Father also. From now on, you know him, and have seen him.”

block.text: Sapos yupela i save pinis long mi, nau bai yupela inap save long Papa bilong mi tu. Nau yupela i stat long save long em. Na yupela i lukim em pinis."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Philip said to him,

block.text: Filip i tokim Jisas olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Lord, show us the Father, and that will be enough for us.”

block.text: "Bikpela, yu soim Papa long mipela, na dispela bai inapim laik na tingting bilong mipela."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus said to him,

block.text: Na Jisas i tokim em,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Have I been with you such a long time, and do you not know me, Philip? He who has seen me has seen the Father. How do you say, ‘Show us the Father?’

block.text: "Filip, longpela taim pinis mi stap wantaim yupela, na yu no save yet long mi, a? Man i lukim mi, em i lukim Papa. Olsem wanem na yu tok, 'Yu soim Papa long mipela'?

ReferenceBlocks.text: Don't you believe that I am in the Father, and the Father in me? The words that I tell you, I speak not from myself; but the Father who lives in me does his works.

block.text: Ating yu no bilip long mi stap long Papa, na Papa i stap long mi? Tok mi givim long yupela, em mi no mekim long tingting bilong mi yet. Nogat. Papa i stap long mi, em i save mekim ol wok bilong en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Believe me that I am in the Father, and the Father in me; or else believe me for the very works’ sake.

block.text: Yupela i mas bilip long dispela tok. Mi stap long Papa, na Papa i stap long mi. Sapos nogat, orait yupela i mas tingim olgeta wok mi save mekim, na dispela bai i kirapim bilip bilong yupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Most certainly I tell you, he who believes in me, the works that I do, he will do also; and he will do greater works than these, because I am going to my Father.

block.text: "Tru tumas mi tokim yupela, man i bilip long mi, bai em tu i mekim olkain wok mi save mekim. Na bai em i mekim ol bikpela wok i winim wok mi bin mekim, long wanem, mi go long Papa.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Whatever you will ask in my name, that will I do, that the Father may be glorified in the Son.

block.text: Na olgeta samting yupela i askim long nem bilong mi, em bai mi mekim. Olsem na Papa bai i kisim biknem long Pikinini bilong en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: If you will ask anything in my name, I will do it.

block.text: Olgeta samting yupela i askim long nem bilong mi, em bai mi mekim."

ReferenceBlocks.text: If you love me, keep my commandments.

block.text: Jisas i tok moa olsem, "Sapos yupela i laikim mi tru, orait yupela bai i bihainim gut ol tok bilong mi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I will pray to the Father, and he will give you another Comforter, that he may be with you forever.

block.text: Na bai mi askim Papa, na em bai i givim yupela narapela Helpim bilong strongim yupela. Na em bai i stap wantaim yupela oltaim oltaim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He is the Spirit of truth, whom the world can't receive; for it doesn't see him, neither knows him. You know him, for he lives with you, and will be in you.

block.text: Dispela Helpim em i Spirit bilong tok tru. Ol manmeri bilong graun ol i no inap kisim em. Ol i no lukim em, na ol i no save long em. Tasol yupela i save long em. Em i stap wantaim yupela, na em bai i stap insait long yupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I will not leave you orphans. I will come to you.

block.text: "Mi no inap lusim yupela na larim yupela i stap nating, olsem pikinini i no gat papamama. Nogat. Mi bai kam long yupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Yet a little while, and the world will see me no more; but you will see me. Because I live, you will live also.

block.text: Liklik taim na bai ol manmeri bilong graun i no lukim mi moa. Tasol yupela bai i lukim mi. Mi stap laip, olsem na yupela tu bai i stap laip.

ReferenceBlocks.text: In that day you will know that I am in my Father, and you in me, and I in you.

block.text: Long dispela de yupela bai i save, mi stap long Papa bilong mi, na yupela i stap long mi, na mi stap long yupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: One who has my commandments, and keeps them, that person is one who loves me. One who loves me will be loved by my Father, and I will love him, and will reveal myself to him.”

block.text: Man i kisim lo bilong mi na i bihainim gut, dispela man em i laikim mi tru. Na man i laikim mi, Papa bilong mi bai i laikim em. Na mi tu bai mi laikim em, na bai mi soim mi yet long em."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Judas (not Iscariot) said to him,

block.text: Jisas i tok olsem, na narapela Judas, em i no Iskariot, em i askim Jisas olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Lord, what has happened that you are about to reveal yourself to us, and not to the world?”

block.text: "Bikpela, olsem wanem na yu bai soim yu yet long mipela, tasol yu no inap soim yu yet long ol manmeri bilong graun?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus answered him,

block.text: Na Jisas I bekim tok bilong em olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “If a man loves me, he will keep my word. My Father will love him, and we will come to him, and make our home with him.

block.text: "Sapos man i laikim mi tru, em bai i bihainim gut tok bilong mi. Na Papa bilong mi bai i laikim dispela man. Na bai mitupela i kam long em na i stap wantaim em oltaim oltaim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He who doesn't love me doesn't keep my words. The word which you hear isn't mine, but the Father's who sent me.

block.text: Man i no laikim mi tru, em i no save bihainim gut tok bilong mi. Dispela tok yupela i harim, em i no tok bilong mi yet. Nogat. Em i tok bilong Papa, em i bin salim mi na mi kam.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I have said these things to you, while still living with you.

block.text: "Taim mi stap yet wantaim yupela, mi tokim yupela long ol dispela samting.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But the Counselor, the Holy Spirit, whom the Father will send in my name, he will teach you all things, and will remind you of all that I said to you.

block.text: Tasol Helpim tru bilong strongim yupela em i Holi Spirit. Na long nem bilong mi, Papa bai i salim em i kam. Em bai i skulim yupela long olgeta samting. Na bai em i kirapim tingting bilong yupela na bai yupela i tingim gen olgeta tok mi bin givim long yupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Peace I leave with you. My peace I give to you; not as the world gives, give I to you. Don't let your heart be troubled, neither let it be fearful.

block.text: "Mi laik lusim yupela, na mi givim bel isi long yupela bai em i ken i stap long yupela. Bel isi bilong mi, em mi givim long yupela. Na bel isi mi givim long yupela, em i no wankain olsem ol manmeri bilong graun i save givim. Olsem na yupela i no ken bel hevi na tingting planti, na yupela i no ken pret.

ReferenceBlocks.text: You heard how I told you, ‘I go away, and I come to you.’ If you loved me, you would have rejoiced, because I said ‘I am going to my Father;’ for the Father is greater than I.

block.text: Yupela i harim pinis dispela tok mi givim long yupela, 'Mi lusim yupela na mi go. Na bai mi kam bek long yupela.' Sapos yupela i laikim mi tru, orait dispela inap mekim yupela i amamas, long wanem, mi go long Papa, na Papa i stap namba wan tru na i winim mi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now I have told you before it happens so that, when it happens, you may believe.

block.text: Dispela samting i no kamap yet, na nau mi tokim yupela pinis long en. Olsem na bihain, taim em i kamap pinis, yupela i ken bilip.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I will no more speak much with you, for the prince of the world comes, and he has nothing in me.

block.text: "Mi no inap mekim planti toktok moa wantaim yupela, long wanem, dispela hetman i save bosim dispela graun em i kam nau. Em i no gat strong bilong mekim wanpela samting long mi,

ReferenceBlocks.text: But that the world may know that I love the Father, and as the Father commanded me, even so I do. Arise, let us go from here.”

block.text: tasol mi laik bai ol manmeri bilong graun i save, mi laikim tru Papa, na mi save mekim olgeta samting Papa i tokim mi long mekim. Orait yupela kirap, na yumi go."

ReferenceBlocks.text: JOHN CHP 15
“I am the true vine, and my Father is the farmer.

block.text: Jisas i tok moa olsem, "Mi yet mi diwai wain tru. Na Papa bilong mi em i papa bilong gaden wain.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Every branch in me that doesn't bear fruit, he takes away. Every branch that bears fruit, he prunes, that it may bear more fruit.

block.text: Olgeta han bilong mi i no save karim kaikai, em Papa i save rausim. Na olgeta han i save karim kaikai, em Papa i save rausim ol lip samting bilong en i nogut, na mekim em i kamap klin, bai em i ken karim planti kaikai.

ReferenceBlocks.text: You are already pruned clean because of the word which I have spoken to you.

block.text: Yupela i kamap klin pinis. Dispela tok mi givim yupela, em i mekim yupela i kamap klin.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Remain in me, and I in you. As the branch can't bear fruit by itself, unless it remains in the vine, so neither can you, unless you remain in me.

block.text: Yupela i mas pas long mi, na bai mi pas long yupela. Sapos han bilong diwai wain em i no pas long diwai, orait em i no inap karim kaikai. Olsem tasol, sapos yupela i no pas long mi, yupela tu i no inap karim kaikai.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I am the vine. You are the branches. He who remains in me, and I in him, the same bears much fruit, for apart from me you can do nothing.

block.text: "Mi yet mi diwai wain, na yupela i han bilong diwai wain. Man i pas long mi na mi pas long em, em i save karim planti kaikai. Sapos yupela i lusim mi, yupela i no inap mekim wanpela samting.

ReferenceBlocks.text: If a man doesn't remain in me, he is thrown out as a branch, and is withered; and they gather them, throw them into the fire, and they are burned.

block.text: Sapos wanpela man i no pas long mi, orait ol bai i rausim em olsem ol i save rausim han bilong diwai, na em bai i drai. Na ol i save bungim ol dispela han na tromoi long paia na kukim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: If you remain in me, and my words remain in you, you will ask whatever you desire, and it will be done for you.”

block.text: "Sapos yupela i pas long mi, na tok bilong mi em i stap long yupela, orait yupela i ken askim inap long laik bilong yupela, na ol samting bai i kamap olsem yupela i bin tok.

ReferenceBlocks.text: “In this is my Father glorified, that you bear much fruit; and so you will be my disciples.

block.text: Yupela i mas karim planti kaikai na i stap disaipel bilong mi, na long dispela pasin Papa bilong mi i kisim biknem.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Even as the Father has loved me, I also have loved you. Remain in my love.

block.text: Papa i save laikim mi tumas, na long wankain pasin mi bin laikim yupela. Oltaim yupela i mas i stap insait long dispela laikim bilong mi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: If you keep my commandments, you will remain in my love; even as I have kept my Father's commandments, and remain in his love.

block.text: Sapos yupela i bihainim gut ol lo na tok bilong mi, orait yupela bai i stap insait long laikim bilong mi, olsem mi bin bihainim gut ol lo na tok bilong Papa bilong mi, na mi stap insait long laikim bilong em.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I have spoken these things to you, that my joy may remain in you, and that your joy may be made full.”

block.text: Mi laik bai amamas bilong mi i ken i stap long yupela, na bai dispela amamas i ken pulap tru long bel bilong yupela. Olsem na mi mekim dispela tok long yupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: “This is my commandment, that you love one another, even as I have loved you.

block.text: Lo bilong mi em i olsem. Yupela wan wan i mas laikim tru ol arapela, long wankain pasin olsem mi bin laikim yupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Greater love has no one than this, that someone lay down his life for his friends.

block.text: Sapos wanpela man i laikim tumas ol pren bilong en na i lusim laip bilong em yet bilong helpim ol, orait dispela pasin bilong laikim ol arapela i winim tru ol arapela pasin bilong laikim ol arapela manmeri.

ReferenceBlocks.text: You are my friends, if you do whatever I command you.

block.text: Na sapos yupela i mekim olsem mi bin tokim yupela, orait yupela i stap pren bilong mi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: No longer do I call you servants, for the servant doesn't know what his lord does. But I have called you friends, for everything that I heard from my Father, I have made known to you.

block.text: Wokboi i no save long ol samting bikman bilong en i save mekim. Olsem na mi no kolim yupela 'wokboi' moa. Nogat. Olgeta tok mi harim long Papa bilong mi, em mi tokim yupela pinis. Olsem na mi kolim yupela 'pren.'

ReferenceBlocks.text: You didn't choose me, but I chose you, and appointed you, that you should go and bear fruit, and that your fruit should remain; that whatever you will ask of the Father in my name, he may give it to you.”

block.text: "Yupela i no bin makim mi bilong i stap wantaim yupela. Nogat. Mi makim yupela bilong i stap ol lain bilong mi. Na mi givim wok long yupela, bai yupela i ken i go na karim kaikai, na bai kaikai bilong yupela i ken i stap gut. Olsem na sapos yupela i beten long Papa long nem bilong mi na askim em long givim wanpela samting long yupela, em bai i givim long yupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: “I command these things to you, that you may love one another.

block.text: Mi givim lo long yupela olsem. Yupela wan wan i mas laikim tru ol arapela."

ReferenceBlocks.text: If the world hates you, you know that it has hated me before it hated you.

block.text: Jisas i tok moa olsem, "Sapos ol manmeri bilong graun i birua long yupela, orait yupela i no ken lusim tingting, pastaim ol i bin birua long mi tu.

ReferenceBlocks.text: If you were of the world, the world would love its own. But because you are not of the world, since I chose you out of the world, therefore the world hates you.

block.text: Sapos yupela i stap olsem ol man bilong dispela graun, orait ol manmeri bilong graun ol inap laikim yupela olsem ol lain bilong ol yet. Tasol yupela i no man bilong dispela graun. Nogat. Mi makim yupela pinis bai yupela i lusim pasin bilong dispela graun. Olsem na ol manmeri bilong graun i save birua long yupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Remember the word that I said to you: ‘A servant is not greater than his lord.’ If they persecuted me, they will also persecute you. If they kept my word, they will keep yours also.

block.text: Yupela i mas tingim gut dispela tok mi mekim long yupela. Wokboi i no winim bikman bilong en. Sapos ol i bin mekim nogut long mi, orait ol bai i mekim nogut long yupela tu. Na sapos ol i bin bihainim tok bilong mi, orait ol bai i bihainim tok bilong yupela tu.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But all these things will they do to you for my name's sake, because they don't know him who sent me.

block.text: Tasol ol i no save long Papa, em i bin salim mi na mi kam. Olsem na ol bai i mekim olgeta dispela pasin nogut long yupela, long wanem, ol i save olsem yupela i lain bilong mi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: If I had not come and spoken to them, they would not have had sin; but now they have no excuse for their sin.

block.text: "Sapos mi no bin i kam na givim tok long ol, orait ol bai i no gat asua bilong sin bilong ol. Tasol nau ol i no gat rot bilong haitim sin bilong ol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He who hates me, hates my Father also.

block.text: Man i birua long mi, em i birua long Papa bilong mi tu.

ReferenceBlocks.text: If I hadn't done among them the works which no one else did, they wouldn't have had sin. But now have they seen and also hated both me and my Father.

block.text: Sapos mi no bin i stap namel long ol na mekim ol dispela strongpela wok i no gat narapela man i bin mekim bipo, orait ol bai i no gat asua bilong sin bilong ol. Tasol ol i lukim pinis ol dispela wok bilong mi, na ol i birua long mi na long Papa bilong mi wantaim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But this happened so that the word may be fulfilled which was written in their law, ‘They hated me without a cause.’”

block.text: Dispela pasin ol i mekim, em i kamap bilong inapim wanpela tok i stap long lo bilong ol. Dispela tok em i olsem, 'Ol man i birua nating long mi.'

ReferenceBlocks.text: “When the Counselor has come, whom I will send to you from the Father, the Spirit of truth, who proceeds from the Father, he will testify about me.

block.text: "Spirit bilong strongim yupela em i stap wantaim Papa, na mi bai salim em i kam long yupela. Em Spirit bilong tok tru, na em i save stap wantaim Papa na i kam. Em bai i kam na tokaut klia long ol wok na pasin bilong mi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: You will also testify, because you have been with me from the beginning.”

block.text: Na yupela tu i mas autim tok, long wanem, yupela i bin i stap wantaim mi long taim mi statim wok, na yupela i stap wantaim mi i kam inap nau.

ReferenceBlocks.text: JOHN CHP 16
“These things have I spoken to you, so that you wouldn't be caused to stumble.

block.text: "Mi no laik bai yupela i lusim bilip, olsem na mi bin mekim dispela tok long yupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They will put you out of the synagogues. Yes, the time comes that whoever kills you will think that he offers service to God.

block.text: Bai ol i tambuim yupela long kam lotu wantaim ol. Na bihain bai taim i kamap, na ol man i kilim yupela i dai, ol bai i ting ol i mekim gutpela wok bilong God.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They will do these things because they have not known the Father, nor me.

block.text: Ol i no save long Papa, na ol i no save long mi. Olsem na ol bai i mekim ol dispela pasin.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But I have told you these things, so that when the time comes, you may remember that I told you about them. I didn't tell you these things from the beginning, because I was with you.

block.text: Tasol nau mi tokim yupela pinis long ol dispela samting bai i kamap. Na bihain, taim ol man i mekim ol dispela pasin long yupela, orait yupela i ken tingim dispela tok mi bin givim yupela." Jisas i tok moa olsem,"Bipo mi yet mi stap wantaim yupela, olsem na mi no tokim yupela long ol dispela samting.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But now I am going to him who sent me, and none of you asks me, ‘Where are you going?’

block.text: Tasol nau mi go long Papa, em i bin salim mi na mi kam. Na i no gat wanpela bilong yupela I askim mi, 'Yu go we?'

ReferenceBlocks.text: But because I have told you these things, sorrow has filled your heart.

block.text: Mi mekim dispela tok long yupela, na nau bel bilong yupela i hevi tumas.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Nevertheless I tell you the truth: It is to your advantage that I go away, for if I don't go away, the Counselor won't come to you. But if I go, I will send him to you.

block.text: Tasol mi tok tru long yupela, mi lusim yupela na mi go, em i bilong helpim yupela. Sapos mi no i go, orait Spirit bilong strongim yupela em bai i no inap i kam long yupela. Tasol sapos mi go, orait bai mi salim em i kam long yupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: When he has come, he will convict the world about sin, about righteousness, and about judgment;

block.text: Em bai i kam na mekim ol man bilong graun i save tru long as bilong sin, na long as bilong stretpela pasin, na long as bilong kot bilong God.

ReferenceBlocks.text: about sin, because they don't believe in me;

block.text: As bilong sin, em i olsem, ol i no bilip long mi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: about righteousness, because I am going to my Father, and you won't see me any more;

block.text: As bilong stretpela pasin, em i olsem, mi go long Papa, na bai yupela i no lukim mi moa.

ReferenceBlocks.text: about judgment, because the prince of this world has been judged.”

block.text: As bilong kot bilong God, em i olsem, dispela hetman i save bosim dispela graun em i lus pinis long kot.

ReferenceBlocks.text: “I have yet many things to tell you, but you can't bear them now.

block.text: "Mi gat planti tok moa mi laik givim yupela, tasol yupela i no inap kisim nau.

ReferenceBlocks.text: However when he, the Spirit of truth, has come, he will guide you into all truth, for he will not speak from himself; but whatever he hears, he will speak. He will declare to you things that are coming.

block.text: Tasol taim Spirit bilong tok tru i kam, em bai i stiaim tingting bilong yupela na bai yupela i save long olgeta tok i tru. Em bai i no mekim tok long tingting bilong em yet. Nogat. Tok em i harim, dispela tasol bai em i autim. Na bai em i tokim yupela long ol samting i laik kamap bihain.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He will glorify me, for he will take from what is mine, and will declare it to you.

block.text: Bai em i kisim tok bilong mi na autim long yupela, na long dispela pasin em bai i kamapim biknem na strong bilong mi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: All things whatever the Father has are mine; therefore I said that he takes of mine, and will declare it to you.

block.text: Olgeta samting bilong Papa em i bilong mi. Olsem na mi tok, em bai i kisim tok bilong mi na autim long yupela."

ReferenceBlocks.text: A little while, and you will not see me. Again a little while, and you will see me, because I go to the Father.”

block.text: Jisas i tok moa olsem, "Liklik taim tasol na bai yupela i no lukim mi moa. Na bihain liklik taim gen na bai yupela i lukim mi."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Some of his disciples therefore said to one another,

block.text: Sampela bilong ol disaipel i toktok namel long ol yet olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “What is this that he says to us, ‘A little while, and you won't see me, and again a little while, and you will see me;’ and, ‘Because I go to the Father?’”

block.text: "Wanem as bilong dispela tok em i mekim long yumi? Em i tok, 'Liklik taim tasol na bai yupela i no lukim mi, na bihain liklik taim gen na bai yupela i lukim mi.' Na tu em i tok, 'As bilong dispela, em i olsem. Mi go long Papa.' "

ReferenceBlocks.text: They said therefore,

block.text: Na ol i tok,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “What does he mean by, ‘A little while?’ We don't know what he is saying.”

block.text: "Dispela 'liklik taim' em i tok long en, em i wanem samting? Yumi no save as bilong dispela tok em i mekim."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Therefore Jesus perceived that they wanted to ask him, and he said to them,

block.text: Jisas i save olsem ol i laik askim em. Olsem na em i tokim ol,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Do you inquire among yourselves concerning this, that I said, ‘A little while, and you won't see me, and again a little while, and you will see me?’

block.text: "Ating yupela i wok long askim nabaut long as bilong dispela tok mi mekim? Mi tok olsem, 'Liklik taim tasol na bai yupela i no lukim mi. Na bihain liklik taim gen na bai yupela i lukim mi.'

ReferenceBlocks.text: Most certainly I tell you, that you will weep and lament, but the world will rejoice. You will be sorrowful, but your sorrow will be turned into joy.

block.text: Tru tumas mi tokim yupela, yupela bai i krai bikpela na krai sori tru. Tasol ol manmeri bilong graun ol bai i amamas. Bel bilong yupela bai i hevi. Tasol bel hevi bilong yupela em bai i tanim na i kamap amamas tru.

ReferenceBlocks.text: A woman, when she gives birth, has sorrow, because her time has come. But when she has delivered the child, she doesn't remember the anguish any more, for the joy that a human being is born into the world.

block.text: Meri i laik karim pikinini, em i save, taim bilong en i kamap pinis. Olsem na em i bel hevi. Tasol taim em i karim pikinini pinis, em i no tingting moa long dispela pen. Nogat. Em i amamas tasol long pikinini i kamap pinis long graun.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Therefore you now have sorrow, but I will see you again, and your heart will rejoice, and no one will take your joy away from you.”

block.text: Olsem tasol, nau yupela i bel hevi. Tasol mi bai lukim yupela gen, na bel bilong yupela bai i amamas. Na i no gat wanpela man inap tekewe dispela amamas bilong yupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: “In that day you will ask me no questions. Most certainly I tell you, whatever you may ask of the Father in my name, he will give it to you.

block.text: Na long dispela taim yupela bai i no askim mi long wanpela samting. Mi tok tru long yupela, sapos yupela i askim Papa long wanpela samting long nem bilong mi, orait em bai i givim long yupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Until now, you have asked nothing in my name. Ask, and you will receive, that your joy may be made full.

block.text: Bipo yupela i no askim long kisim wanpela samting long nem bilong mi. Yupela i mas askim, na bai yupela i kisim, na bai amamas i ken pulap tru long bel bilong yupela."

ReferenceBlocks.text: I have spoken these things to you in figures of speech. But the time is coming when I will no more speak to you in figures of speech, but will tell you plainly about the Father.

block.text: Jisas i tok moa olsem, "Mi bin mekim ol dispela tok long yupela long tok bokis. Bihain bai mi no mekim tok bokis moa long yupela. Nogat. Bai mi tokaut klia na tokim yupela long Papa.

ReferenceBlocks.text: In that day you will ask in my name; and I will not ask the Father for you.

block.text: Long dispela taim yupela bai i prea long nem bilong mi. Na mi no tokim yupela olsem, mi yet bai mi prea long Papa long em i helpim yupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For the Father himself loves you because you have loved me, and have believed that I came forth from God.

block.text: Nogat. Papa em yet i laikim yupela, long wanem, yupela i bin laikim mi, na yupela i bilip pinis long mi bin stap wantaim God na mi kam.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I came out from the Father, and have come into the world. Again, I leave the world, and go to the Father.”

block.text: Bipo mi bin stap wantaim Papa, na mi lusim em na mi kam long graun. Nau mi laik lusim graun na mi go bek long Papa."

ReferenceBlocks.text: His disciples said to him,

block.text: Ol disaipel bilong en i tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Behold, now you speak plainly, and speak no figures of speech.
Now we know that you know all things, and don't need for anyone to question you. By this we believe that you came forth from God.”

block.text: "Yes, nau yu tok klia. Nau yu no mekim tok bokis.
Nau mipela i save, yu no mas wetim man i askim yu pastaim na yu bekim askim bilong en. Nogat. Yu save pinis long olgeta samting. Olsem na mipela i bilip olsem yu bin i stap wantaim God na yu kam."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus answered them,

block.text: Jisas i bekim tok bilong ol olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Do you now believe?
Behold, the time is coming, yes, and has now come, that you will be scattered, everyone to his own place, and you will leave me alone. Yet I am not alone, because the Father is with me.

block.text: "Nau yupela i bilip, a?

Harim. Taim i klostu nau. Yes, em i kamap pinis, na ol bai i ranim yupela olgeta wan wan i go nabaut long ples bilong yupela. Na yupela bai i lusim mi na bai mi stap wanpis. Tasol mi no inap i stap wanpis tru, long wanem, Papa i stap wantaim mi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I have told you these things, that in me you may have peace. In the world you have oppression; but cheer up! I have overcome the world.”

block.text: Mi laik bai yupela i pas long mi na bai yupela i stap bel isi, olsem na mi bin mekim dispela tok long yupela. Long taim yupela i stap long dispela graun, ol hevi bai i kamap long yupela, tasol bel bilong yupela i ken i stap strong. Mi winim pinis strong bilong dispela graun."

ReferenceBlocks.text: JOHN CHP 17
Jesus said these things, and lifting up his eyes to heaven, he said,

block.text: Jisas i autim tok pinis long ol disaipel, na em i lukluk i go antap long heven, na em i tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Father, the time has come. Glorify your Son, that your Son may also glorify you.

block.text: "Papa, taim i kamap pinis. Nau yu ken givim biknem long Pikinini bilong yu, olsem na bai Pikinini i ken givim biknem long yu.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Even as you gave him authority over all flesh, he will give eternal life to all whom you have given him.

block.text: Long wanem, yu givim namba pinis long em. Yu makim em bilong i stap het bilong olgeta manmeri, na em inap givim laip long ol man yu bin givim long em, em laip bilong i stap gut oltaim oltaim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: This is eternal life, that they should know you, the only true God, and him whom you sent, Jesus Christ.

block.text: Na laip bilong i stap gut oltaim, em i olsem. Ol man i kisim dispela laip, ol i save long yu, yu wanpela tasol yu God tru. Na ol i save long Jisas Krais, em yu bin salim i kam.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I glorified you on the earth. I have accomplished the work which you have given me to do.

block.text: "Mi bin soim biknem na strong bilong yu long ol manmeri bilong dispela graun. Mi pinisim pinis dispela wok yu bin givim mi long mekim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now, Father, glorify me with your own self with the glory which I had with you before the world existed.

block.text: Papa, taim graun i no kamap yet, mi stap wantaim yu na mi gat biknem. Nau mi laik bai yu givim dispela biknem long mi gen na bai mi stap wantaim yu.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I revealed your name to the people whom you have given me out of the world. They were yours, and you have given them to me. They have kept your word.

block.text: "Mi autim pinis nem bilong yu long ol man yu bin givim mi long dispela graun. Ol i man bilong yu, na yu givim ol pinis long mi. Na ol i bin bihainim gut tok bilong yu.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now they have known that all things whatever you have given me are from you.

block.text: Nau ol i save, olgeta samting yu givim mi pinis, em i kam long yu tasol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For the words which you have given me I have given to them, and they received them, and knew for sure that I came forth from you, and they have believed that you sent me.

block.text: Olgeta tok yu givim mi, em mi givim pinis long ol. Na ol i kisim, na ol i save tru tumas olsem, bipo mi bin stap wantaim yu na mi kam. Na ol i bilip olsem, yu bin salim mi na mi kam.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I pray for them. I don't pray for the world, but for those whom you have given me, for they are yours.

block.text: "Mi beten bilong helpim ol. Mi no beten bilong helpim olgeta manmeri bilong graun. Mi beten bilong helpim ol dispela man yu bin givim mi, long wanem, ol i bilong yu.

ReferenceBlocks.text: All things that are mine are yours, and yours are mine, and I am glorified in them.

block.text: Olgeta manmeri bilong mi, ol i bilong yu. Na olgeta manmeri bilong yu, ol i bilong mi. Na taim ol manmeri i lukim ol dispela lain bilong mi, ol i save long biknem bilong mi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I am no more in the world, but these are in the world, and I am coming to you. Holy Father, keep them through your name which you have given me, that they may be one, even as we are.

block.text: "Nau mi kam long yu, na mi no inap i stap moa long graun. Tasol ol bai i stap long graun. Na Papa, yu holi na i no gat wanpela i olsem yu, yu ken lukautim ol long strong bilong nem bilong yu, em dispela nem yu bin givim long mi. Olsem na ol i ken i stap wanpela tru, olsem mitupela i stap wanpela tru.

ReferenceBlocks.text: While I was with them in the world, I kept them in your name. Those whom you have given me I have kept. None of them is lost, except the son of destruction, that the Scripture might be fulfilled.

block.text: Taim mi stap wantaim ol, mi lukautim ol long strong bilong nem bilong yu, em dispela nem yu bin givim mi. Mi bin was gut long ol na i no gat wanpela bilong ol i lus. Man bilong lus, em wanpela tasol i lus, bai tok i stap long buk bilong yu i ken kamap tru.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But now I come to you, and I say these things in the world, that they may have my joy made full in themselves.

block.text: Nau mi kam long yu. Na mi mekim ol dispela tok long taim mi stap yet long graun, bai amamas bilong mi i ken pulap i stap long bel bilong ol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I have given them your word. The world hated them, because they are not of the world, even as I am not of the world.

block.text: "Tok bilong yu, mi givim pinis long ol. Na ol manmeri bilong dispela graun ol i save birua long ol, long wanem, ol manmeri bilong mi ol i no bilong dispela graun, olsem mi tu mi no bilong dispela graun.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I pray not that you would take them from the world, but that you would keep them from the evil one.

block.text: Mi no askim yu long kisim ol i go aut long dispela graun. Nogat. Mi beten long yu long yu ken lukautim ol, na man nogut i no ken bagarapim ol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They are not of the world even as I am not of the world.

block.text: Ol i no bilong dispela graun, olsem mi yet mi no bilong dispela graun.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Sanctify them in your truth. Your word is truth.
As you sent me into the world, even so I have sent them into the world.

block.text: Tok bilong yu i tru olgeta, na mi laik bai yu mekim tok tru bilong yu i wok insait long bel bilong ol, na mekim ol i kamap ol lain bilong yu stret.
Bipo yu bin salim mi na mi kam i stap namel long ol manmeri bilong graun. Olsem tasol mi bin salim ol man yu bin givim mi bai ol i go i stap namel long ol manmeri bilong graun.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For their sakes I sanctify myself, that they themselves also may be sanctified in truth.

block.text: Na bilong helpim ol, mi givim laip bilong mi olgeta long yu, olsem bai tru tumas ol i ken kamap man bilong yu stret.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Not for these only do I pray, but for those also who believe in me through their word,

block.text: "Tasol mi no beten bilong helpim ol dispela man tasol. Nogat. Mi beten bilong helpim ol manmeri bai i harim tok bilong ol na i bilip long mi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: that they may all be one; even as you, Father, are in me, and I in you, that they also may be one in us; that the world may believe that you sent me.

block.text: Mi laik bai dispela olgeta man i ken i stap wanbel, olsem yu Papa, yu stap long mi na mi stap long yu. Olsem tasol mi laik bai ol i ken i stap long mitupela, na bai ol manmeri bilong graun i ken bilip olsem yu bin salim mi na mi kam.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The glory which you have given me, I have given to them; that they may be one, even as we are one;

block.text: Yu bin givim bikpela namba na strong long mi, na mi bin givim long ol, bai ol i ken i stap wanbel, olsem mitupela i stap wanbel.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I in them, and you in me, that they may be perfected into one; that the world may know that you sent me, and loved them, even as you loved me.

block.text: Mi stap long ol, na yu stap long mi, na long dispela pasin mi laik bai ol i ken kamap wanbel tru. Olsem na ol manmeri bilong graun i ken save, yu bin salim mi na mi kam, na yu laikim ol dispela lain bilong mi long wankain pasin olsem yu bin laikim mi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Father, I desire that they also whom you have given me be with me where I am, that they may see my glory, which you have given me, for you loved me before the foundation of the world.

block.text: "Papa, mi laik bai ol manmeri yu bin givim long mi ol i ken i stap wantaim mi long ples mi stap long en. Mi laik bai ol i ken lukim bikpela lait na namba bilong mi. Taim graun i no kamap yet, yu laikim mi, na yu bin givim dispela lait na namba long mi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Righteous Father, the world hasn't known you, but I knew you; and these knew that you sent me.

block.text: Stretpela Papa, ol manmeri bilong graun ol i no save long yu. Tasol mi save long yu. Na ol dispela lain bilong mi, ol i save, yu bin salim mi na mi kam.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I made known to them your name, and will make it known; that the love with which you loved me may be in them, and I in them.”

block.text: Mi bin kamapim nem bilong yu long ol. Na bai mi kamapim moa yet, bai ol i ken kisim pasin bilong laikim ol arapela man, olsem yu save laikim mi. Na mi tu mi ken i stap long ol."

ReferenceBlocks.text: JOHN CHP 18
When Jesus had spoken these words, he went out with his disciples over the brook Kidron, where there was a garden, into which he and his disciples entered.

block.text: Jisas i mekim dispela tok pinis, na em wantaim ol disaipel bilong en ol i go brukim wara Kidron. Long hapsait bilong dispela wara wanpela gaden i stap, na Jisas wantaim ol disaipel bilong en ol i go insait long gaden.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now Judas, who betrayed him, also knew the place, for Jesus often met there with his disciples.

block.text: Judas, em man i laik givim Jisas long han bilong ol birua, em tu i save long dispela gaden, long wanem, planti taim Jisas i save bung wantaim ol disaipel bilong en long dispela gaden.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Judas then, having taken a detachment of soldiers and officers from the chief priests and the Pharisees, came there with lanterns, torches, and weapons.

block.text: Olsem na Judas i kisim ol lain soldia na sampela plisman bilong ol bikpris na ol Farisi, na em i bringim ol i kam long dispela hap. Na ol i holim ol lam na bombom na ol samting bilong pait.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus therefore, knowing all the things that were happening to him, went forth, and said to them,

block.text: Jisas i save long olgeta samting i laik kamap long en. Olsem na em i go klostu long ol dispela lain na i askim ol olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Who are you looking for?”

block.text: "Yupela i painim husat?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: They answered him,

block.text: Ol i bekim tok bilong em olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Jesus of Nazareth.”

block.text: "Mipela i kam bilong painim Jisas bilong Nasaret."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus said to them,

block.text: Na Jisas i tokim ol,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “I am he.”

block.text: "Em mi tasol."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Judas also, who betrayed him, was standing with them.

block.text: Na Judas, em man i laik givim em long ol, em i sanap wantaim ol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: When therefore he said to them, “I am he,” they went backward, and fell to the ground.
Again therefore he asked them,

block.text: Ol i harim Jisas i tok, "Em mi tasol," na ol dispela man i surik i go bek na i pundaun long graun.
Na Jisas i askim ol gen,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Who are you looking for?”

block.text: "Yupela I painim husat?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: They said,

block.text: Na ol i tok,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Jesus of Nazareth.”

block.text: "Jisas bilong Nasaret."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus answered,

block.text: Na Jisas I bekim tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “I told you that I am he. If therefore you seek me, let these go their way,”

block.text: "Mi tokim yupela pinis, em mi tasol. Na sapos yupela i painim mi, orait larim ol dispela man i go."

ReferenceBlocks.text: that the word might be fulfilled which he spoke, “Of those whom you have given me, I have lost none.”

block.text: Long dispela pasin em inapim dispela tok em i bin mekim bipo, "Ol dispela man yu bin givim mi, i no gat wanpela bilong ol i lus."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Simon Peter therefore, having a sword, drew it, and struck the high priest's servant, and
cut off his right ear.

block.text: Saimon Pita i bin karim wanpela bainat i kam, na em i pulim bainat na i paitim wokboi bilong hetpris, na bainat i
katim yau long han sut bilong dispela wokboi na yau i pundaun.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The servant's name was Malchus.
Jesus therefore said to Peter,

block.text: Nem bilong dispela wokboi em Malkus.
Na Jisas i tokim Pita,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Put the sword into its sheath. The cup which the Father has given me, shall I not surely drink it?”

block.text: "Putim bainat i go bek long paus bilong en. Olsem wanem? Yu ting mi no inap dring long dispela kap Papa i bin givim mi?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: So the detachment, the commanding officer, and the officers of the Jews, seized Jesus and bound him.

block.text: Orait na ol lain soldia na namba wan ofisa bilong ol, na ol plisman bilong ol Juda, ol i holimpas Jisas na pasim em long baklain.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They led him to Annas first, for he was father-in-law to Caiaphas, who was high priest that year.

block.text: Na ol i kisim em i go long Anas pastaim. Anas em i tambu bilong Kaiafas. Kaiafas em hetpris long dispela yia.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now it was Caiaphas who advised the Jews that it was expedient that one man should perish for the people.

block.text: na em i dispela man i bin tokim ol Juda olsem, "I gutpela sapos wanpela man tasol i kisim ples bilong ol manmeri na i dai."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Simon Peter followed Jesus, as did another disciple. Now that disciple was known to the high priest, and entered in with Jesus into the court of the high priest;

block.text: Saimon Pita wantaim narapela disaipel, tupela i bihainim Jisas i go. Hetpris i save long dispela arapela disaipel, olsem na em i bihainim Jisas i go insait long banis bilong hetpris.

ReferenceBlocks.text: but Peter was standing at the door outside. So the other disciple, who was known to the high priest, went out and spoke to her who kept the door, and brought in Peter.

block.text: Tasol Pita i sanap i stap ausait klostu long dua. Olsem na dispela arapela disaipel, hetpris i save long en, em i go tokim meri i bosim dua, na em i bringim Pita i kam insait.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Then the servant girl who kept the door said to Peter,

block.text: Meri i bosim dua, em i askim Pita olsem,

block.characterId: servant girl at high priest's courtyard

ReferenceBlocks.characterId: servant girl at high priest's courtyard
ReferenceBlocks.text: “Are you also one of this man's disciples?”

block.text: "Ating yu tu yu disaipel bilong dispela man?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: He said,

block.text: Na Pita i tok,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “I am not.”

block.text: "Nogat. Mi no disaipel bilong en."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now the servants and the officers were standing there, having made a fire of coals, for it was cold. They were warming themselves. Peter was with them, standing and warming himself.

block.text: Ol wokboi na ol plisman i bin wokim wanpela paia. Ples i kol, na ol i sanap na hatim skin bilong ol i stap. Na Pita tu i sanap wantaim ol na i hatim skin bilong en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The high priest therefore asked Jesus about his disciples, and about his teaching.
Jesus answered him,

block.text: Long dispela taim hetpris i askim Jisas long ol disaipel bilong en, na long tok em i bin givim long ol man.
Na Jisas i bekim tok olsem long em,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “I spoke openly to the world. I always taught in synagogues, and in the temple, where the Jews always meet. I said nothing in secret.

block.text: "Mi bin givim tok long ol manmeri long ples klia. Oltaim mi bin skulim ol manmeri insait long ol haus lotu na insait long banis bilong tempel, long ol ples olgeta Juda i save bung long en. Mi no bin mekim wanpela tok long ples hait.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Why do you ask me? Ask those who have heard me what I said to them. Behold, these know the things which I said.”

block.text: Olsem na bilong wanem yu askim mi? Yu mas askim ol man i bin harim dispela tok. Ol i save long tok mi bin mekim."

ReferenceBlocks.text: When he had said this, one of the officers standing by
slapped Jesus with his hand, saying,

block.text: Jisas i tok olsem na wanpela plisman i sanap i stap, em i
solapim Jisas na i tok,

block.characterId: officials of high priest, one of the

ReferenceBlocks.characterId: officials of high priest, one of the
ReferenceBlocks.text: “Do you answer the high priest like that?”

block.text: "Olsem wanem tru na yu bekim tok bilong hetpris long dispela kain pasin?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus answered him,

block.text: Na Jisas i bekim tok bilong em olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “If I have spoken evil, testify of the evil; but if well, why do you beat me?”

block.text: "Sapos mi mekim tok nogut, orait yu mas tokaut klia long dispela tok mi bin mekim. Tasol sapos mi mekim gutpela tok, orait watpo yu paitim mi?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: Annas sent him bound to Caiaphas, the high priest.

block.text: Orait Anas i salim Jisas i go long hetpris Kaiafas. Na ol i no rausim dispela baklain ol i bin pasim em long en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now Simon Peter was standing and warming himself. They said therefore to him,

block.text: Saimon Pita i sanap i stap na i hatim skin bilong en. Na ol i askim em olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “You aren't also one of his disciples, are you?”

block.text: "Ating yu tu yu disaipel bilong en, a?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: He denied it, and said,

block.text: Na em i tok,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “I am not.”

block.text: "Nogat. Mi no disaipel bilong en."
